description.zh:
本課程之宗旨在於讓學生全盤瞭解現代化空間資訊、掌握空間資訊自動化研究方向、提供專業擴展及實力培養、並開創研究和就業格局。課程內容包含：
一、空間資訊簡介、
二、航測及遙測概要、
三、地理資訊系統概要、
四、全球定位系統簡介、
五、數碼城市簡介。
description.en: The objective of this course is multi-fold. First of all, it offers an unique opportunity to obtain comprehensive understanding about modern geoinformatics. In this course, students will be able to gain insights into the state-of-the-art research, development, and applications in geoinformatics, especially the 3S technologies (RS, GIS, GPS) and their integrations for sophisticated applications such as cyber city implementation and applications. For engineering students, this course is also an effective platform for capacity-building and career extending. The main topics of this course include: 1) Introduction (geoinformatics at a glance), 2) Remote Sensing (remote sensing fundamentals, airborne remote sensing, and satellite remote sensing), 3) Geographic Information Systems (GIS), 4) Global Positioning System (GPS), 5) Cyber City Implementation and Applications.

notes: 四土三四甲乙合開，計網電腦教室，限57人

description.zh: 本課程主要教授學生七大項方向1.複習矩陣學2.結構矩陣學基本概念3.勁度法觀念4.勁度法解桁架問題5.勁度法解梁問題6.勁度法解剛架問題7.程式分析實習
description.en:
The course contents are divided into 7 major topics: 1. Review the matrix theory; 2.Basic concepts of the matrix structural theory; 3. Stiffness method; 
4. Using stiffness method to solve truss problem; 5. Using stiffness method to solve beam problem; 6. Using stiffness method to solve rigid frame problem; 7. Practice of the structural analysis program.

notes: 四土三四甲乙合開，限40人

description.zh: 課程內容包含：(1)緒論、(2)運輸系統規劃、(3)公路工程概述、(4)交通工程概述、(5)鐵路工程概述、(6)航空工程概述、(7)港灣工程概述。
description.en:
Integrated transportation systems from the standpoint of assembly,haul,and distribution means.Analysis of transport
equipment and traveled way.Power requirements,speed, stopping,capacity,economics,route location.Future technological developments and innovations.

description.zh: 本課旨在介紹各種基礎工程施工。課程摘要可分：(1)概說、(2)基礎種類、(3)基礎之支承力、(4)支承力試驗、(5)基礎開挖、(6)直接基礎、(7)樁基概說、製造、打擊之法、(8)場樁施工、穩定液泥水管理、(9)反循環鑽掘工法、(10)貝諾特工法、(11)土鑽工法、(12)預壘樁、(13)深基礎工法、(14)開口沈箱、(15)地下連續壁、(16)地錨、(17)地下構造物、(18)水平方向推進工法、(19)托底工法。
description.en: With the knowledge of Soil Mechanics and Foundation Engineering, a series of underground construction methods will be elaborated. They are slurry diaphragm wall,pile foundation (reverse,or cased),anchor system, foundation excavation,drainage system,bracing system and monitoring system etc.

description.zh: 工程地質對於工程結構物之規劃、設計、施工、維護等均有重要關係。本課程內容包括：(1)地質調查、(2)岩石之風化及其性質、(3)地下探查、(4)地球物理探測、(5)邊坡滑動與山坡、(6)建築物、結構物之基礎、(7)公路與鐵路、(8)隧道、(9)壩址地質調查。
description.en: Fundamentals of mineralogy,petrology,sedimentation,stratigraphy,and structural geology needed by environmental scientists to understant earth materials.

description.zh: 河溪生態工法導論包含河岸保護及復育，利用植生與土壤工程的結構系統保護湖泊、河口及河川，使其免受侵蝕。因此本課程授課內容將包含測量、逕流推估、水力學、基礎土壤工程、水工構造物、植草的水道及出口、蝕溝處裡、分水工、河川及濕地復育、施工材料及以土壤工程保護邊坡並降低沖蝕量。
description.en: Stream ecological engineering method consists of restoring and protecting banks of streams, lakes, estuaries, and excavated channels against scour and erosion by using vegetative plantings, soilengineering, and structural systems.  The content of this course includes engineering surveys, estimating runoff, hydraulics, elementary soils engineering, structure, grassed waterways and outlets, gully treatment, diversions, stream and wetland restorations, construction and construction materials, and soil bioengineering for upland slope protection and erosion reduction.

description.zh: 1.	營建組織介紹2.	營建工程概述   3.	預算與成本控制與管理   4.	進度控制與管理5.	施工計劃6.	工程發包與估算作業7.	物料與機具管理8.	合約與規範管理9.	安全衛生管理10.	品質管理
description.en: 1.	Introduction of the construction organization   2.	Introduction of the operation in the construction site  3.	Budget and cost control management   4.	Budget and cost control management5.	Planning of construction engineer project6.	Purchase and Estimate 7.	Material and Equipment control management8.	Contract and specification management9.	Safety and sanitation management10.	Quality control management

notes: 四建四、四創意四與進修部二技合開

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹台灣現行依據都市更新條例相關法令推動都市更新之相關議題，透過理論與案例介紹瞭解台灣都市更新操作機制及趨勢。
description.en: a

notes: 四建四與進修部二技合開【停開】

description.zh: 本工程對基礎工程施工時容易產生的隆起、沙湧、上舉、液化、地下室上浮等災害介紹其產生之原因與案例，同時在時間許可下也介紹高層建築中常見的連續壁工程及逆打工程師公中應注意的要點
description.en: This course purpose to illustrate the cause and case for foundation construction failures and disasters, which includes Heaving, Quick Sand, Up-Lift, Liquefaction and Basement UP Lift, etc. If time is allowed, I will extra introduce which important to pay attention items for construction of Slurry Wall Engineering and Up-Down construction Method Engineering which often be used in High-Rise Architecture.

notes: 四建四、四創意四、設計學院與進修部二技合開【停開】

description.zh:
本系在強調理論與實務並重的教學規劃中，隸屬建築技術體系的建築材料、構造、施工課程以五個學期分年循序漸進地建置。其中本課程為技術課程之最後一哩，整合前期授業內容之整合、亦屬工程案例之實務解析。
本門課在十八週的進度規劃下，以三個子單元形成授業的主要架構:第一單元「建築生產」:主要從近年建築產業的趨勢，講解全球化、市場需求、國土戰略、城鄉變遷等因素下，對於建築業的衝擊與因應而生的技術發展內容；第二單元「建築細部設計技術」:從建築構法計畫的角度分析各種設計性能落實於細部時如何解決聲音、照明、熱傳、空氣、水等課題；第三單元「設計/施工技術案例」：實際以本校近期新建工程(精勤樓、誠樸樓、億光大樓)為例，結合校外協力專家進行專案案例之進程與技術管理要點之分享。
description.en: N

description.zh:
本課程教學之目的為使同學了解各系統之設備概要，管線配置及管道空間設計應注意之事項，希望同學具備與專業機、水電技師討論之能力： 
(1)從空調、電力、給排水、消防運輸…等設備，探討建築物理環境控制系統的特性，了解如何從建築之計劃、設計、施工至使用管理等各階段與建築設備之搭配。
(2)探討建築設計於電力、照明、空調、熱水及再生能源…等系統節約能源的做法及其效益
課程目標：
(1)使學生了解各環境控制系統之內容及其特性，做為創造節能舒適且方便之建築空間之基底。
(2)使學生了解各環境控制系統之設備、管線空間大小、配置應注意事項。
(3)使學生具有與機、水電專業技師討論之能力。
(4)使學生能了解推動綠建築所需之電力、照明、空調、熱水、再生能源設備節能技術。
課程期間若有機會將安排實地設備參觀。
description.en:
The purpose of this course is teaching students to understand the equipment to make a summary of the various systems, plumbing and piping space design should pay attention to the matter, I hope the students have the ability to discuss with the professional machines, electrical and mechanical technician:
(1) From the air conditioning, electrical, plumbing, fire protection and other equipment transportation ... to explore the physical properties of building environmental control systems, learn how from a planned architecture, design, construction management, to be used with the various stages of the construction equipment.
(2) To explore the architectural design for power, lighting, air conditioning, hot water systems and renewable energy ... energy conservation practices and their effectiveness
Course Objectives:
(1) Enable students to understand the content and features of the environmental control system, as the creation of energy-efficient, comfortable and convenient base building sp

description.zh: 本課程主要為介紹與歷史建築與古蹟之保存與再利用相關的觀念、理論、技術與發展概況，授課採講演方式。
description.en: This module introduces primarily the involved concept, theory, technique and the general conditions of its development. Class will be conducted by lecturing.

name.zh: BIM建築資訊系統實務及應用
name.en: The practice and application of Building Information Modeling (BIM)

description.zh: BIM在建築生命週期中，可借由3D視覺模擬於規畫設計階段相互溝通，施工階段時，最重要碰撞撿討、4D進度模擬、施工圖面整合，5D 估價計算，可協助建案進行更加順利。本課程除介紹BIM發展現況及各國相關証照外，並針對學生軟體工具使用再提升，以進階建模及整合之軟體操作為主。
description.en:
Building Information Modeling (BIM) in the building life cycle by 3D visual simulation in the design phase of the planning to communicate with each other, the construction phase, most important collision picking discuss the integration of 4D progress of the simulation, the construction drawings 5D valuation calculations, can assist in building cases smoothly.
This course introduces the BIM use of development status of countries and relevant certificates type. And re-enhancement for student software tools use Advanced modeling and integration of software operation.

notes: 四建三與四創意三合開(建築)【停開】

description.zh: 本課程主要在教導學生對西方(歐洲及西亞)認識歷史建築之演進過程與思考涵構，並使學生具備西方文化歷史與思想的相關知識，其主要授課內容如下：1.在範圍上--自古埃及、西亞、而收至古典建築、基督教建築、中世紀的大教堂時代以至文藝復興及17、18世紀的建築歷史。2.在思想上--自希臘的文化與哲學思想談起，以至各時代之政治、宗教與社會文明之演進，瞭解歷史涵構及其對建築的表現。3.在建築上─針對每一時期的建築表現，瞭解其構造方法、材料應用及相關細部特徵。

notes: 四建一與四創意一合開(限主修建築系選課)

description.zh: 本課程涵蓋數位時代中一手檔案史料的整理與數位化過程，著重檔案資料的典藏管理與加值應用。課程目標在於培養學生的檔案智能，包括：1. 認識檔案資料類型與特性，以及數位保存的相關概念；2. 理解檔案編排分類與描述著錄等資訊組織的基本原則3. 具備檔案資料查找、評估與運用數位典藏等檔案專業素養。
description.en: This course will introduce the basic concepts and practical issues in modern archives administration. And then, focus on the long-term preservation and open access of digital archives. By attending the class students will: (1) Understand basic concepts of archival materials relating to digital preservation. (2) Gain in-deep understanding the principles of archives arrangement and information organization. (3) Possess the archival intelligence to find, evaluate and use the digital information.

description.zh:
1.廣告一定要花大錢嗎？那可不一定！
我們一起找出不花大錢，又能廣而告知的好方法吧!
2.讓學生了解各類型的廣告方式，不是只學美工而已。
3.國內外各類別優良廣告觀摩後進行創意引導與實作
4.每一小組就是一公司，我們從CI,LOGO和品牌故事開始做廣告
description.en:
1.Understand the various types of advertising methods, more than art design.
2.Every team is a company, you should design the logo and brand story with brain storming. Through practical case studies, finding the way to sell creative.
3.Watching and doing, learning more about advertising tools and use them.

description.zh: 學習Music Maker 16軟體的功能操作，並引導學生使用軟體加上課堂上教授的編曲要素、MIDI輸入、合成器的使用及混音技巧…等，融會貫通製作出自己的第一首歌。
description.en: To learn “Music Maker 16” functional operation, and to guide students working software on arranger elements, MIDI input, and the use of synthesizers and mixing skills. We expect students can produce their first song by performing music maker.

notes: 計網電腦教室，限40人(中午開始上課)

description.zh: 課程主要為探討插畫意涵與設計相關表現形式。透過對物象的觀察，開發創作與設計的資源。練習插畫技法（色鉛筆，水彩，壓克力，拼貼，與軟體組合），並結合現代設計理念，發展創新的文創設計風格。熟悉媒材的表現方式與技巧，並能實驗於文創設計中。
description.en: This course mainly explores the illustrator implications associated with the design manifestations. Through observe the images, the learner can develop the creative and design resources. The learner can exercise the illustration techniques (color pencil, watercolor, acrylic, collage, and software combination); combine with modern design, the development of innovative cultural and creative design. At last, the learner will be familiar to the illustrator expressions and skills in order to develop a new experiment in cultural and creative design.

description.zh: 土的文化特質幾乎沒有國界與語言之分，二次戰後，在美國以彼德、沃克斯（Peter Voulkos）為首的陶藝運動，引發容器美學的爭辯，日本走泥社（Sodeisha Group）以純粹造型的革命興起前衛陶藝，這兩股新興的藝術風潮，藉由教育，展演，競賽，工作營及個人工作室的發達，先後為台灣的陶藝創作環境，注入新的訊息，透過本課程對世界當代陶藝發展的檢視，引導同學思考台灣如何在當代找尋到自我的文化認同，以及思索土這項媒材所面臨的定位問題。
description.en: The development of Contemporary ceramics after World War II is affected by different territories, cultures and histories. Peter Voulkos was one of the leading artists who proposed abstract ceramics movement and vessel aesthetics issues in America. At the same time, in Japan, Sodeisha presented works as ceramics sculpture; the idea of ceramics was shifted from functional to sculptural works. However, people who studied overseas and then brought Eastern and Western ideas to home represented the ceramic art in Taiwan during 1980’s. They delivered their concepts and presented their works through schools, exhibitions, competitions, workshops and private studios. Today, Taiwanese contemporary ceramics was generally derived from these backgrounds and looking for our own cultural identity.

description.zh: 本課程在使學生瞭解與企業（工業）相關之法律，以為未來就業時能具備基本之法律基礎。課程大綱如下：商事法之特質、民法概述、商業登記法、公司法、票據法、保險法。
description.en: This course is set to make the students understand the concepts of laws dealing with related industrial and business, and being the base of working in the futures. It includes: 1. The characters of business laws. 2. The presentment of civil code. 3. The business registration laws and business laws. 4. The insurance laws.

description.zh: 本課程主要著重於讓學生瞭解在日常生活中，食衣住行育樂等活動與化學之相互關係。尤其對在生活中所接觸之食品、衣著、環境與用品應有所認識，並以化學觀點了解其與人體之關係。此課程主要內容包括(1)食品化學(Food Chemistry)，(2)衣著化學 (Cloth Chemistry)，(3)環境化學(Environmental Chemistry)，(4)核化學(Nuclear Chemistry)，(5)水化學 (Hydrochemistry)，(6)界面化學 (Interface Chemistry)，(7)家庭用化學品 (Household Chemicals)，(8)化粧品學(Cosmetic Chemistry)，(9)電化學 (Electrochemistry)
description.en: This course focuses on chemistry related to People`s Livelihood, including: Food Chemistry, Cloth Chemistry, Environmental Chemistry, Nuclear Chemistry, Hydrochemistry, Interface Chemistry, Household Chemicals, Cosmetic Chemistry, and Electrochemistry. Topics concerning about the manufacturing processes, application principles and recent developments of People`s Livelihood chemicals are also discussed in this course.

description.zh: 本課程以講述物理化學上，尤其是量子化學上，必須用到的數學為主。內容主要涵蓋三大部分。第一部分為基本線性代數，包含向量，矩陣，以及行列式等，第二部分為特殊函數與傅立葉轉換，第三部分則應用數值分析。
description.en: This course is mainly focus on the mathematics for physical chemistry, especially for quantum chemistry. It is divided into three parts. The first part is related to the linear algebra, such as vector, matrix, determinants, eigenvalues, diagonalization, and so on. The 2nd one is special function and Fourier analysis, including series solutions for differential equations, Hermite polynomials, Laguerre polynomials, Legendre polynomials, and Fourier transformation. The last one is related to the numerical analysis which is including Boltzmann distribution, Gaussian distribution, least square analysis.

description.zh: 係利用物理機械整理及化學處理方式，改善紡織品之吸引性、服務性和最終用途之機能性。整理加工技術包括結構穩定性(諸如壓縮、煮呢、蒸呢、熱定型)；表面特性改質(諸如平滑性、粗糙性、光澤性及其他美觀性質)與功能性改質(諸如防縐、防縮、防火、防污、防水、防微生物與昆蟲、耐光、耐冷熱、耐污染質及化學藥劑、耐氣候、耐摩擦、抗起球、抗靜電)。
description.en: The attractiveness, serriceability and end-use performance of textiles are imporved by the application of physical mechanical and chemical processes.  Finishing techniques include dismensional stabilization(such as, sanforization, crabbing, decatizing, heat-setting),modification of surface characteristics(such as, smoothness, roughness, luster, other esthetic fabric qualities) and functional property modification (such as, resistance to wrinkle shrinkage, fire, soils and stains, water, microorganisms and insect, light, heat and cold, air pollutants and chemical agents, weathering, abrasion, pilling and static change).

description.zh: 本課程被設計為介紹有關棉細紗、毛系紗、加工絲及複合紗製造系統，與其有關之細節亦被包括在內，其課程包含有製造流程、紡紗設備之機構與終端用途。此外，本課程被架構在朝向新式紡紗製造方法，製程管制與品質管制之新近發展，電腦控制系統與自動測試系統。纖維與成紗結構和性質間之相互關係及檢測亦被討論。
description.en: The course is designed to introduce in staple, filament and composite yarns manufacturing systems, which include manufacturing process, spinning mechanism and end applications. Furthermore, the course is structured towards an advanced study of the newer methods of yarn manufacture, and the latest developments in processing control and quality control, computerized control systems and automatic measuring systems. Relationships between fiber and yarn structural properties are also discussed.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹微生物及其應用，學生將可習得何謂微生物，微生物如何運作，以及微生物的應用。課程內容包括: (1)微生物的分類、型態、結構及一般特性; (2)微生物的生長與控制; (3)微生物的生理與代謝; (4)微生物的應用，例如生物轉換、一次及二次代謝產物的生產、基因重組蛋白的生產、核酸藥物的生產等。
description.en: The objective of the course is to introduce the major concepts, principles and applications of microbiology. Students will learn about what microorganisms are, how they function, and their industrial applications. The course include the following topics: (1) Classification and structures; (2) Microbial growth and control; (3) Microbial physiology and metabolism; (4) Applications, such as biotransformation, production of primary and secondary metabolites, production of recombinant proteins, etc.

description.zh: 操作與高分子物理相關的實驗
description.en: It covers the fundamental experiments in polymer physics.

description.zh: 就主要的染料和顏料之化學結構、製造方式和基本化性予以闡述，以便對色料的相關應用有較為明晰的瞭解。
description.en: Chemical structure, manufacturing and properties of main dyes and pigments are studied. Further applications of the colourstuff are explained.

name.en: Special Topics of Materials Science and Engineering

description.zh: 對各種材料（金屬、陶瓷、高分子、複合材料）之基本原理，性質及應用，做概要性的介紹。內容包括材料之晶體結構與晶體缺陷，固體材料之原子擴散，相圖與相變化，材料製程及應用，材料之物理性質（光性質、電性質、磁性質及熱性質）.
description.en: Special topics in 1.The structure of crystalline solids. 2.Imperfections in solids. 3.Phase transformation and phase equilibrium. 4.Strengthening mechanism of materials. 5.Metal alloys 6.Ceramics 7.Polymers

description.zh: 染顏料(色料)雖已發展百餘年，唯部分現象與實驗結果仍須進一步的研究以獲得完整正確的解釋。本課程主要探討染料的吸收光譜與其分子結構式的關係，是為具有色料化學與有機化學基礎的同學所設計的。
description.en: Although studies on synthetic colourants have been performed for more than 100 years, their detailed elucidation requires further extensive research. This course reviews the absorption features of organic dyes and recent progress in their explanation in terms of molecular structure. This course is mainly intended for organic chemists and colour chemists which are interested in the spectral characteristics of dyes and their conceptual understanding.

description.zh: 本課程針對紡織產業創新技術議題與實務操作，安排演講及工廠參訪實習，邀請跨領域之企業講師進行紡織工業技術演講，包括機能性纖維研發與應用、環保染整助劑、功能性織物、高強力纖維織物及塑膠回收再生製品開發等相關創新技術進行講演。除了課程中安排學生到相關紡織產業工廠實地見習。
description.en: The course is to introduce the trends and the characteristics of textile industries in the new millennium. This course will invite well-known entrepreneurs and experts to share their success stories and new technology with the students.

notes: 四分三四與最後一哩合開，有2場參訪活動

description.zh: 本課程係探討纖維製品在非衣著終端領域之應用，例如電子電機，土木，材料，生醫，航空與車輛工程等之應用。其內容包括功能性與機能性纖維、複合紗、複合織物、編帶、非織物、纖維系複合材料與電線電纜、光纖電纜等之製造方法、原理與其終端應用領域。最後將討論微細加工技術與微細粉末在纖維與高科技工業上之應用。
description.en: The course is to interpret the application of the non-apparel textiles at the different end uses, such as application in electrical and electronic, civil, material, biomedical, aerospace, and vehicle engineering etc.  It includes fabrication methods, principles, and end application fields of the performance and functional fibers, composite yarns, composite fabrics, braid, nonwoven, textile composites, and cables and optical cables etc.　Finally, the micro processing technology and powder in textile and high-tech industries will be discussed.

name.zh: 電動車與冷凍空調系統之微處理器
name.en: Application of microprocessor on electrical vehicle and refrigerator air-conditioning system

description.zh: 本課程是應用電子學進階課程。主要重點在教授微處理器應用於電動車與冷凍空調系統，並強調以實務練習及範例設計為主的方式。本課程介紹 CANbus系統 ，使用Freescale開發的嵌入式實驗開發平台，介紹微處理器電路設計最重要的觀念，以及 ARM晶片架構與系統程式等相關重點。
description.en: This course is the advanced electronics. The main goal is to introduce the application of microelectronics on the electric vehicle and refrigerator, air conditioning system. The lectures will focus on the practice and example design. The contents include two parts. First one is the introduction of Controller Area Network (CAN, or CANbus).   Second one is the introduction of the microelectronics circuits. All the application and circuits design will be practiced on the developing board of Freescale Company.

notes: 四能四與四車四合開(合開 待聘老師時數2)

description.zh: 空調設計基礎、空調冷暖負載計算、空氣線圖應用分析、主要設備規範擬定、空調系統規劃與設備選用分析、風管工程設計、水配管工程設計、設備配置與裝設工程、材料與成本分析、節約省能規劃設計。
description.en: Fundamentals of HVAC system design, cooling/ heating load estimation, analysis of applied psychometrics charts, schematic design of HVAC system, main equipment selection, main equipment specification, air duct & water piping system design, equipments layout & installation, materials & cost analysis. HVAC's energy saving & energy efficient planning.

description.zh: 本科目將由認識地球上太陽能之基本熱輻射理論，結合各種不同形式之太陽能源有效利用裝置，討論太陽能之有效利用方式及相關系統技術。以期在既有太陽能利用技術上，發揮更有效率的太陽能源工程系統設計，奠定未來21世紀太陽能源利用之高效率化基礎。
description.en:
The aim of this course is to discuss three individual topics of more specialized nature: large PV systems, photo-voltaic under concentrated sunlight and the hydrogen economy. After completing this course the students should be able to:
1. Understand the specific features of large PV systems, an    examine their economic and technical characteristics.
2. Explain the advantages and disadvantages of concentrator    PV systems, and discuss their operation.
3. Analyze the structure of the hydrogen economic and show    its feasibility and future
   potential.

name.zh: 車輛電力轉換系統實驗

description.zh: 本課程內容包含應用於車輛電能轉換系統的轉換器工作原理以及實驗平台建立。此外，針對新能源與車輛電力整合，本課程探討燃料電池、光伏電池、超級電容器以及先進電力電子轉換器與電動機驅動技術於車輛電力系統應用。而車輛電力系統中直流和交流配電架構的合理設計準則，也一併討論及分析。最後，針對電動車輛與智慧微電網系統整合的科技潮流，未來電動車電力系統將需要設計Vehicle-to-Grid(V2G)協助穩定電網或Vehicle-to-House(V2H)成為家用不斷電裝置系統。因此，本課程擬講授各種新型電力轉換器及電池充電器，並將其區分為隔離型/非隔離型、單向/雙向電力潮流特性之轉換器及其設計實例。
description.en: The contents of this course explore the operation principles and experimental bench setup of different converter topologies for vehicle electric conversion systems. Also, the course discuss new clean energies such as fuel cells, photovoltaic cells, super-capacitors integrated with advanced power electronic converters, and motor drive technology for the vehicle electric conversion applications. DC and AC power distribution architecture of the vehicle electric conversion system also be discussed and analyzed. Finally, corresponding to the trends of electric vehicles integrated smart micro-grid system technology; the electric vehicle power system needs the Vehicle-to-Grid (V2G) function to stabilize the grid or Vehicle-to-House (V2H) function used for household uninterruptible power device system applications. Therefore, this course will teach a variety of new power converters and battery charger with classifications of isolated / non-isolated, unidirectional / bidirectional power flow fe

description.zh: 本課程介紹超文本標記語言(HTML)語法與層疊樣式表(CSS)之應用。課程內容包括：1. 超文本標記語言 2. 層疊樣式表 3. JavaScript 直譯式腳本語言 4. HTML5 APIs 語法 5. CSS3 特徵 6. DOM 文件物件模型 7. JQuery 函式庫 8. JSON 資訊交換語言 9. AJAX 非同步傳輸 10. SVG 可縮放向量圖形 11. HTML5 Canvas 應用程式介面 12. WebGL 三維繪圖 13. 自調式網頁設計 14. Bootstrap 15. 網頁文字編排學 16. 網頁字型。
description.en: This course introduces HyperText Markup Language (HTML) and Cascading Style Sheets (CSS). The course topics include: 1. HTML syntax, 2. CSS syntax, 3. JavaScript, 4. HTML5 APIs syntactic features, 5. CSS3 features, 6. Document Object Model (DOM), 7. jQuery library, 8. JavaScript Object Notation (JSON), 9. Asynchronous JavaScript and XML (AJAX), 10. Scalable Vector Graphics (SVG), 11. HTML5 Canvas API 12. WebGL, 13. Responsive Web Design (RWD), 14. Bootstrap, 15. Web Typography, 16 Web Fonts.

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹在計算機科學中常見或基本的資料結構,探討的主題包括: ADT(抽像資料型態)及複雜度, 靜態結構與儲存表示, 陣列，堆疊，佇列，串列，樹狀結構，遞迴，排序, 搜尋。
description.en: This course is mainly aimed at introducing the data structures commonly used in programming languages which include ADT (abstract data type) and complexity, static structures and their storage representations, arrays, stacks, queues, linked lists, trees, recursion, sorting, and searching.

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹在計算機科學中常見或基本的資料結構,探討的主題包括: ADT(抽像資料型態)及複雜度, 靜態結構與儲存表示, 陣列，堆疊，佇列，串列，樹狀結構，遞迴，排序, 搜尋。
description.en: This course is mainly aimed at introducing the data structures commonly used in programming languages which include ADT (abstract data type) and complexity, static structures and their storage representations, arrays, stacks, queues, linked lists, trees, recursion, sorting, and searching.

notes: 四資二與四電資二合開

name.zh: 產業策略規劃與技術布局
name.en: Industry Strategic Planning and Technology Road-Mapping

description.zh: 產業策略規劃與技術布局課程旨在教育學生對高科技、傳統與服務產業之屬性深入了解與培養策略規劃之核心能力，並且藉由跨領域實作課程中，學習技術布局流程，以培養科技大學學生進入職場之策略規劃與技術布局能力。 課程包含六大新興、四大智慧、十大服務產業之策略規劃學理內涵、流程、技術研析與布局，並由案例說明導引分組討論與發表。
description.en: The purpose of the "Industry Strategic Planning and Technology Road-Mapping" class is to educate students to have the more insight capability on the Hi-Tech, Conventional, and Service Industries and to learn the processes of the strategic planning and technology road-mapping. This is also intent to assist the Technology University students to shorten their industry learning curve once they are hired. The class will introduce the Taiwan six emerging industries, four intelligent industries, and ten service industries including the background, justifications, process, and technology roadmap. Also, it will have the several case-studies to lead the student to do the exercise through the group discussion and present their findings and results.

notes: 大四、車輛所與職車輛所合開

description.zh: 本課程介紹字體設計與文字編排學的基本概念，理解文字編碼原理，熟悉資訊處理技術。課程內容包括：1. 電腦字體設計 2. 書法運筆 3. 襯線體 4. 無襯線字體 5. 文字編排學 6. 字間微調 7. 字形替換 8. 可縮放向量圖形技術 9. TrueType二次貝茲曲線 10. OpenType 三次貝茲曲線 11. 數字系統 12. 字集標準 13. 電腦字型格式 14. 編碼方法 15. 統一碼 16. 可變長度字元編碼 17. 中日韓統一表意文字。
description.en: This course introduces Computer Typography, Type Design, Character Encoding, and Information Processing Techniques. The course topics include: 1. Computer Type Design, 2. Calligraphy, 3. Serif, 4. Sans Serif, 5. Typography, 6. Kerning, 7. Glyph Substitution, 8. Scalable Vector Graphics, 9. TrueType Quadratic Bezier Curve, 10. OpenType Cubic Bezier Curves, 11. Number Systems, 12. Character Set Standards, 13. Font Formats, 14. Encoding Methods, 15. Unicode, 16. Unicode Transformation Format, 17. Chinese, Japanese and Korean (CJK) Unified Ideographs.

description.zh: 藉由大量的人物寫生，從人性關懷的角度速寫記錄人生百態，速寫重點要「神」、「形」兼備。下一步是靜態單人速寫練習，體態美見於動、靜、張、弛的表現，且比例要正確。下筆速、簡、精、準、是練習重點。接下來是靜態雙人、多人速寫練習。除了依循單人速寫練習要點，並加入空間透視感，使畫面構成更生動有趣。
description.en: The course begins with a lot of figure sketching. You have to care about all walks of life, and actively observe and record their figures. Try to master both the charm and the form of the model.  Next focusing on static mono-figure sketching, you have to demonstrate your techniques in presenting either the static or the dynamic, the state of tension or looseness. You also have to be precise in proportion when you do your sketch. Stress definitely on the practice of speediness, simplicity, accuracy, and preciseness. Also work on static twin-figure and multi-figure sketching. Besides incorporating guidelines from the previous activity, you have to add the sense of spatial perspective to make your sketch more vivid and

notes: 四設二三四與四創意三四合開

description.zh: 使學生了解台灣廚具產業概況，廣泛邀請廚具業師講述廚具產業相關商品研發、設計、製造、銷售、服務等知識，並進行實務參訪，以作為進入廚具產業職場之就業準備。
description.en: This course introduces students the state of art of the kitchen industries in Taiwan.  In order to prepare students to work in kitchen industries, experts are invited to address issues about the design, manufacturing, sale and service of kitchen appliances.  Some field trips are also arranged.

notes: 四設四與最後一哩合開，有一場參訪活動，限50人

description.zh: 本課程著重實務性訓練Pro/ENGINEER系統之操作能力，輔以幾何模型學理論說明CAD技術的發展現況。首先介紹CAD概論，說明電腦輔助設計技術的趨勢，培養學生具備現代數位產品開發概念與同步工程之意義；然後教授Pro/ENGINEER系統的各部分功能、指令操作，並以設計專題引導學生建立實務應用，強化學生的操作與應用能力。
description.en: Introduction of the fundamental of 3D CAD technology and the manipulation of the software packages, Pro/ENGINEER, for product design in a concurrent engineering environment. By the practical projects, the students are trained more adept skill and application experience.

description.zh: 從展示空間之規劃過程讓學生了解規劃的基礎概念及空間設計之實務，以達到展示之最佳效果，例如施工設計、色彩、照明、空間結構、展示佈置以及櫥窗設計等展示效果。
description.en: This course develops the students understanding of the exhibition design process and practical experience such as lighting, coloring, space structure, arrangement and construction, and show window design.

notes: 四設三與四創意三合開(家室組)

description.zh: 室內設計場景細部的處理，例如進階的燈光及材質表現，同時培養同學互相討論與問題解決。
description.en: The sophisticated treatment for the scene of indoor design, like advanced light and material performance, which can train classmates to have the capacity of mutual discussion and problem-solving at the same time.

description.zh:
探討木材之物理及機械性質對於家具構造與製造品質之影響，並讓學生瞭解材料之組織構造以熟識家具用材之鑑定。終其目標在使學生認識材料進而善用材料。

介紹以木質材料為主之家具材料。內容含蓋木材之外觀特徵，組織構造，材料鑑識及其物理與機械性質對於家具構造和製造品質其間之關係等。
description.en: The macrostructure and microstructure of wood. Identification and uses of common Softwoods and Hardwoods. Physical and mechanical properties in relation to wood processing. Properties of other wood based materials such as particleboard, fiberboard, plywood, laminated wood related to their use in furniture manufacture also included.

notes: 家室組；新聘紀尚德1鐘點

description.zh:
(一)嘗試引導同學作相關設計研究，探索符合社會、人文的設計策略，以國際消費者趨勢、競爭者分析、科技趨勢、國際設計研究為依據，用清晰的思路作不同的市場定位。
(二)培養同學觀察市場，了解資訊。以一設計師應有能力，發展出利基性產品的關鍵性因素分析報告。並探索不同族群之消費行為分析，作為加速產品開發流程及建立利基性產品之依據，可爭取商機及最大利潤。
(三) 每位同學需完成團隊分析報告，與授課老師指定之其他作業。
description.en: This course aims to help students to develop analysis skills on design trends in global context, including the sensibility and judgment of design style, design service, and design industry. Assignments include case studies other required reports.

description.zh: 讓學生學習電腦2D與3D軟體之技能，俾能應用於工程製圖，並配合其他各種參數式3D與材質編修電腦軟體之整合。
description.en: The study of 2D and 3D computer software which could be applied to the engineering drawing, and the integration with parametric 3D and materials edit computer software.

description.zh:
將試作技術課程內所習之試作技術應用發揮，以產品設計圖為依據，
應用各種材料及加工技術完成產品之立體表達。
description.en:
To practice product model building techniques . 
Based on product engineering drawing , let techning design students to practice model making techniques with difference material and working methods .

description.zh: 講授透視圖的基本原理、種類與方法及透視陰影,並以設計實例透視圖練習應用,培養靈活應用透視圖法於設計表達。
description.en: This course aims to provide the student with theories and skills of perspective drafting by specifically introducing perspective theories and ways of drawing, and being concurrent with the practice of drawing in industrial design.

description.zh:
(1)簡介
(2)FPGA系統
(3)FPGA結構
(4)組合邏輯設計
(5)順序機設計
(6)FPGA雛形系統設計
(7)FPGA雛形系統驗證
(8)大型系統設計
description.en:
(1)Introduction
(2)FPGA-Based Systems
(3)FPGA Fabrics
(4)Combinational Logic Design
(5)Sequential Machines Design
(6)FPGA Prototyping Systems Design
(7)FPGA Prototyping Systems Verification
(8)Large-Scale Systems Design

notes: 四子三四甲乙合開，限45人

name.zh: 電力電子積體電路設計

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生如何使用電腦輔助設計軟体來設計電力電子積體電路,進而能培養學生具有設計電力電子積體電路的能力,課程內容包念： 1.電源管理IC設計簡介 2.電壓參考電路設計 3.低電壓降電壓調整器設計 4.交換式電壓調整器 5.交換電容電源轉換器 6.電池充電技術與應用 7.設計專題討論
description.en: This course is trained the student to use computer-aided design tools for the design of power electronic integrated circuit. Therefore, the student has the design capability of power electronic integrated circuit. The contents of this course: 1.Introduction to power management IC design 2. Voltage reference Design 3.Low dropout regulator design 4. Switching voltage regulator 5.Switching Capacitor Regulator 6.Battery charging techniques and applications 7.Design project discussion

notes: 四子三四甲乙合開，限45人

name.zh: 人體生物學及生物物理學
name.en: Biology and Biophysics of Human Body

description.zh:
在過去的60年裡，生物醫學工程學科發展已成為明確的，多樣化的，內容無所不包的領域；包括生物電現象、生物信息學、生物材料、生物力學、生物儀器、生物傳感器、生物信號處理等領域，以及生物技術、計算生物學和複雜多樣性、基因組學、醫學影像學、光學和雷射激光、輻射影像、組織工程等。
本課程主要將適用於工程學門學生，且已完成物理、化學或生物學基礎課程為佳。此基礎在大二或大三的學生應該已可做好充分的準備。本課程將學習人體解剖學、生理學、生物物理學和生物醫學工程。整合了一系列知識，以幫助修課同學瞭解生物訊息和醫學儀器，並可以用來監測這些生物醫學現象。課程的學習主要是將這些生物醫學現象，運用其基礎於電力、壓力和流量的物理現象加以說明，並將這些生物醫學現象經由電子及工程的特殊條件和應用系統而呈現。在這種學習中，課程涵蓋了相關醫學和生物學領域、化學、物理、工程的知識和方法，期使將其成功及適當應用於多種生物醫學儀器。本課程將主要研習人體結構（解剖）及其功能系統（生理學），但這些原則同樣也可能適用於其它所有生命系統。
經由醫學背景引導進入此領域，結合工程及材料師長的經驗及參與，將可含括主要生醫工程及組織工程領域的基礎
description.en: Over the past sixty years, as the discipline of biomedical engineering has evolved, it has become clear that it is a diverse, seemingly all-encompassing field that includes such areas as bioelectric phenomena, bioinformatics, biomaterials, biomechanics, bioinstrumentation, biosensors, biosignal processing, biotechnology, computational biology and complexity, genomics, medical imaging, optics and lasers, radiation imaging, tissue engineering, moral and ethical issues. This course will be designed primarily for engineering students who have completed physical equations and a basic course in statics of chemistry and biology.  Students in their sophomore year or junior year should be adequately prepared for this course.  This course will be learning about human anatomy, biophysics, physiology, and biomedical engineering. It brings together a number of disciplines to help understand biomedical phenomena and the instrumentation that can be used to monitor these phenomena. It is primarily abo

notes: 四子三四甲乙與電子所合開，限35人

description.zh: 課程綱要： 1.半導體元件簡介 2.物理氣相沉積 3.化學氣相沉積 4.微影─光阻覆蓋，曝光，顯影 5.蝕刻─濕式蝕刻，乾式蝕刻 6.攙雜─擴散法，離子植入法 7.氧化和熱處理製程
description.en: Course Outline： 1.Introduction to Semiconductor Device 2.Physical Vapor Deposition 3.Chemical Vapor Deposition 4.Photolithography─photoresist coating, exposure, development 5.Etching─wet etching, dry etching 6.Doping─diffusion, ion implantation 7.Oxidation and Thermal Treatment Process

notes: 四子三四甲乙合開，限45人

description.zh: 1.簡介2.機率統計交通3.媒體存取控制協定4.通道配置5.衛星系統6.三代細胞式行動通訊標準7.網路協定8.各式無線網路
description.en: 1.Introduction 2.Probability, statistics, and traffic theories 3.MAC protocols 4.Channel allocation 5.Satellite systems 6.3G cellular standards 7.Network protocols 8.WLAN, WMAX, UWB, Bluetooth, etc.

notes: 四子三四甲乙合開，限45人

name.zh: 基頻通訊積體電路設計實驗
name.en: Baseband Communication Integrated Circuits Design Laboratory

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生如何使用電腦輔助設計軟体來設計基頻通訊積體電路,進而能培養學生具有設計基頻通訊積體電路的能力,課程內容包念： 1. 數位傳輸 2. 頻道模式 3. 接收器設計 4. 進階系統設計
description.en: This course is trained the student to use computer-aided design tools for the design of baseband communication integrated circuits. Therefore, the student has the design capability of baseband communication integrated circuits. The contents of this course: 1. Digital transmission 2.Channel model 3.Receiver design 4.Advanced systems design

notes: 電子系、電機系三年級合開，限45人

description.zh: 瞭解常見之演算法及其分析，1.Complexity、Big-Oh符號，2.演算法之分析，3.集合、優先佇列，4.樹、平衡樹，5.排序演算法，6.搜尋演算法，7.圖形演算法，8.幾何演算法，9.NP-complete problems之理論及對策。
description.en:
1.Complexity 
2.Analysis of algorithms
3.Set,priorty queue
4.Tree,Balanced tree
5.Sorting algorithms
6.Search algorithms
7.Graph algorithms
8.Geometry algorithms
9.NP-complete problems

notes: 四子三甲與四電資二合開

１.數值解之介紹：精確度與誤差觀念
２.插值及多項式
３.數值積分與微
４.數值線性代數
５.非線性方程式之解
６.曲線配合與函數近似
７.近似解理論
８.常微分方程式的數值解法

5.Numerical solution fo Nonlinear Systems

5.Inheritance

7.Polymorphism

9.Introduction to C++, Java, and Smalltalk 
10.Case Study

description.zh: 1.積體電路的分類，2.積體電路晶片設計的流程，3.CMOS元件的基本結構與佈局，4.CMOS元件的設計規範技術，5.CMOS元件組成各種數位電路，6.以高階方法探討積體電路之設計，7.系統分割，8.設計問題之探討，9.IC的構造， 10.設計方法，11.時序問題之探討，12.鐘脈問題之探討，13.VLSI之測試，14.有助於設計與測試的結構化技巧探討，15.專題製作。

1.Classification of VLSI circuit 
2.Flow of VLSI design 
3.VLSI characterization 
4.CMOS design methods
5.CMOS digital circuit 
6.High-level VLSI design
7.System partiton 
8.Time squence
9.Clock
10.VLSI testing 
11.Special projects

description.zh: 此門課程的主要目標，將介紹數位多媒體晶片設計，讓學生對於數位多媒體晶片設計有深入的認識與了解，進而產生濃厚的興趣與設計能力。
description.en:
This course covers theoretical foundations and applications in digital multimedia IC design. The outline of this course is given as follows. 
1. Introduction 
2. Digital IC Design
3. Color Science
4. Multimedia System 
  a. Image and Video Coding
  b. State-of-the-art Image and Video Coding Standards (industry)
  c. 3D Video System
  d. Holographic System
5. Multimedia IC Design Methodology

notes: 四子四甲乙與電子所合開，限35人
四子三甲乙合開，限45人【停開】

name.zh: 使用者導向設計與跨專業合作創新
name.en: User Experience Design ＆ Interdisciplinary Collaborate Innovation

description.zh:
Innovation Design Workshop (IDW)是UDDC華冑設計整合美國GE公司、I公司、史丹佛大學、卡內基美隆大學、荷蘭飛利浦公司等學術與業務單位，應用於產品與服務創新上，一系列的「使用者情境體驗導向、跨專業合作創新」方法（User-Oriented Innovative Design Process and Disciplinary Innovation），以市場策略導向的「使用者情境體驗」工作營方法進行創意激盪，引領企業邁入前瞻性規劃，激發新產品與服務創新價值（Innovalue），帶動產業之永續創新。藉由跨領域團隊協同共融，從工作營中洞悉、觀察及體驗使用者需求，找尋創新脈絡及契機，以有紀律、有效率的方式，策略性的激發產品創新概念。 使用者導向的情境體驗法，為21世紀知識經濟時代針對產品、設備及服務，以宏觀時空環境及微觀使用者生活型態、生活行為為導向，從事產品創新設計研發的方法。在產品、設備與服務系統設計開發前及過程中，以情境預演與觀察的方式，從使用者的角度，先行訂定產品策略、市場定位，界定使用者特質，思想模式及生活情境，進而以體驗設計
模式，進行使用情境的預想、觀察、分析，並將設計構想透過情境模擬體驗，驗證所設計的產品、設備與服務，是否能真正符合消費者與使用群族的需求。
description.en: Provide a great opportunity to practice interdisciplinary collaborative design in product innovation. Encourage more flexible design approach that creates new innovative product value (innovalue) and emerging market perspectives. Using「user-oriented innovative design process」into this collaborative practice, in order to develop a broader range of design concept directions. Strategy Mapping & Positioning _ Competitor product analysis Design Feature Attribute Mapping (Scope/Target User/Quantity/Product & Design Definition)

notes: 四設四、創新設計碩士--日、職合開、最後一哩

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 介紹晶體形成過程、相變化與結構狀態、物性與化性關係以及其有關之探討技術與應用。
description.en: Solid state chemistry introduces the process of the crystal growth, phase change and the structural state.  The course also discusses the relationship of its chemical and physical properties.

notes: 四化甲乙丙與化工所合開

description.zh: 本課程為輔導學生在建築設計操作過程的不同階段，以適切且具創造力的表現媒材與技法呈現階段性的成果，從空間觀察與記錄、問題分析、概念發想、方案演化，直至具體方案的模擬與傳達性的說明，養成具備創意競賽實力與實務接軌能力的設計師。
description.en: As an integral part of the process of designing and understanding architecture, the course is structured to introduce advanced representational and fabrication techniques applied to architecture. Through experiential learning and exploring, students are expected to able to use different media to develop analytical, critical and representational skills and as generative design tools.

description.zh: 本課程首先介紹社區的階層意義及規劃程序及方法，其次舊社區規劃的主要內涵包括土地使用規劃、運輸規劃、公共設施規劃各以理論發展及案例操作說明，尤其是土地使用與運輸規劃之整合及鄰避性公共設施規劃案例之舉證。在就社區規劃後之整體開發方式說明，如何由二度的平面規劃成為三度空間的開發。期中考後將針對更前瞻性及更細緻的規劃技巧作為授課的內容，包括生態社區規劃的方法、災害及防災規劃，並舉科技的發展包括網際網路及捷運之發達對社區規劃的衝擊及因應。最後舉全球化及競爭力對社區發展的影響。另外以本人服務於實務界多年，得由同學指定欲瞭解或探討的課題由教師準備講授，以增加共同討論的意願，冀讓同學能對生活的空間有個全貌的初識。二個學分的課程僅能讓同學對環境有所管窺，希望加上其他的課程，讓同學進而因之他、關懷他、愛他而願意以專業與他結緣終生，那怕我們沒有好的居住環境！
description.en: This course is an introduction on the meaning of community hierarchy, the procedure and methodology of planning, as well as theoretical developments and case studies regarding major planning issues such as land use, transportation, and case studies on NIMBY facilities.Furthermore, I will also demonstrate planned unit developments and how to transform a two-dimensional planning into a three-dimensional development.After the midterm, I'll focus on more foresighted and deliberate planning techniques, including ecological community planning methods, disaster-preventive, planning, and the possible coping measures with respect to the impacts resulting from technological advances such as the internet and the mass transit systems. At the end, I'll also cover topics regarding the impacts of globalization and competition upon community developments.As I have had a lot of empirical experiences from my job, the students are allow to specify some topics or issues for this class so that the students

notes: 四建四與進修部二技合開【停開】

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為讓學生可以利用暑期或其它時間至學校認可之校外公私立機構進行或參與實習，以增進學生之實務能力。學生於學校認可之校外機構實習總累計時數不得低於320小時。學生實習期滿後，應依據各系規定繳交相關實習相關成果報告，彙交所屬系保存，並作為成績核定之依據。學生校外實習學期成績之評定比例原則：實習單位占50%，輔導老師占50%，各系得依其屬性調整之。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to elevate an all-round ability for the students at NTUT. During the summer break　or other periods of time, students are required to go to government-based organizations or industry/business-oriented agencies with respect to promoting practice of ability. The course takers will need to stay in the same individual organization or agency with an accumulated amount of time of no less than 320 hours. After the students complete the requirements in question, these organizations and agencies will offer them certificates -- or proof of any kind -- in accordance with the real performance on site. The grading principle will be equivalently decided by the thesis advisor (50%) and the on-site organization or agency (50%), respectively. The individual department or graduate institute may make proper adjustments according to the situations in need.

name.zh: 新聞英語及聽力訓練（二）

description.zh: 本課程目的在啟發學生英語聽力，分析及思辨能力。本課程自報紙，雜誌及電視選取豐富的新聞及媒體教材, 以訓練聽力及筆記的技巧。 此外，在課堂上將討論一些有爭議性的或者有趣的議題，以培養學生獨立思辨能力。
description.en: The course aims to develop the student's techniques of listening, analyzing and critical thinking in English. A variety of journalistic and media texts will be selected from newspapers, magazines and T.V. to reinforce listening training and note-taking skills. Besides, some controversial or interesting issues will be discussed in class to encourage the student's independent and critical thinking.

name.en: Fabrication of Potoelectronic Materials and Device

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。 1.單晶的生長 2.磊晶技術 3.擴散與離子植入 4.乾式及溫式蝕刻 5.化學蒸氣沈積法 6.金屬薄膜技術 7.光電元件製程 8.元件特性量測與分析
description.en: 1.Single crystal growth 2.Engitaxial technique 3.Diffusion and implantation 4.Dry and wet etching 5.Chemical vapor deposition 6.Metal film coating 7.Manufacturing process of photo electronic element 8.Characterization measurement and analysis of element

notes: 億光1035,系所合開,畢業後擬抵研究所學分請選研究所課

name.zh: 半導體廠營運管理及先進製造技術
name.en: Fab Operation Management and Advanced Manufacturing Technology

description.zh: 半導體廠營運管理及先進製造技術這門課分為兩個部分；營運管理部分的課程內容主要是以IE的角度，探討IE在半導體廠中可以參與什麼樣的營運活動，其內容包含的課題如供應鏈管理、產能規劃、成本分析、預算管理、建廠及設施規劃、專案管理、策略規劃、技術移轉及開發管理以及合約及商業談判等。講師以其自身的經歷，提供給同學不同於教科書上的實務經驗。第二部分將以先進製造技術專題的方式講授，包含批次控制、虛擬量測、錯誤偵測、高混線生產等議題。
description.en: This lecture includes two segments. For “Operation Management”, a few popular topics will be addressed from I.E. point of view in a semiconductor company such as “Supply Chain Management”, “Capacity Planning”, “Cost Analysis”, “Budget Management”, “Construction and Facility Planning”, “Strategic Planning”, “Management in Technology Transfer and Development” and “Agreement and Business Negotiation”, etc. Instructor will share his personal experiences in practice which are quite different from the textbooks. For “Advanced Manufacturing Technology”, some state-of-the-art APC topics will be addressed. Included are “R2R Control”, “Virtual Metrology”, “Fault Detection”, “High-Mix Product Control”, among others.

notes: 四工四甲乙、工管所合開

description.zh: 本課程在研習數位電視，此課程包含 EDTV HDTV，SDTV。其課程目的在給予學習者了解數位電視分析與設計，並強調基礎與應用知識以符合工業界的需求，課程內容可包括下列主題。1.影像簡介， 2.顏色空間， 3.類比影像介面， 4.數位影像介面， 5.數位影像處理， 6. NTSC,  PAL, 和 SECAM 系統， 7. H.261 和 H.263， 8. MPEG， 9.數位電視。
description.en: This course is concerned with the digital television (DTV) design, which includes Enhanced Definition Television (EDTV), High Definition Television (HDTV), Standard Definition Television (SDTV). Its purpose is to deal with the analysis and design of DTV system, emphasizing fundamentals as well as new paradigms that students need to master in today's industry. The course covers the following topics. 1. Introduction to Video; 2. Color space; 3. Analog video interfaces; 4. Digital Video Interfaces; 5. Digital Video Processing; 6. NTSC, PAL, and SECAM system; 7. H.261 and H.263; 8. MPEG ; 9. Digital Television (DTV).

notes: 四子四甲乙與電子所合開，限25人

description.zh: 瞭解常見之演算法及其分析，1.Complexity、Big-Oh符號，2.演算法之分析，3.集合、優先佇列，4.樹、平衡樹，5.排序演算法，6.搜尋演算法，7.圖形演算法，8.幾何演算法，9.NP-complete problems之理論及對策。
description.en:
1.Complexity 
2.Analysis of algorithms
3.Set,priorty queue
4.Tree,Balanced tree
5.Sorting algorithms
6.Search algorithms
7.Graph algorithms
8.Geometry algorithms
9.NP-complete problems

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本課程係以提高學生新聞英文閱聽能力為主， 使得學生能廣泛熟悉各類新聞媒介的文章專論. 學生將建立各領域的常用/專用字彙, 了解分析寫作風格與技巧, 並增強聽力能力.  透過日日變化更新的世界時事, 學習英文將是切身相關, 生動活潑的經驗.  除了英語能力提升或知識增長豐富之外, 更可以奠定未來繼續獨立學習的基礎. 教學材料來源取材自China Post, Time, Newsweek, CNN, 民視英語新聞等新聞媒體。
description.en: The aim of this course is to guide students into the world of modern English in a wide range of writing styles and subject matters.  It intends to build up confidence and competence of students who are interested in reading a variety of topics in the newspapers and magazines as well as other media. The first focus is to enrich vocabulary tank by learning key words in realms like business, economic, politics, entertainment, art; the second is to help master the writing skills and styles in journalism; the last is to enhance listening ability via broadcasting materials on audio/video channels like ICRT and CNN.

description.zh: 本課主旨在培養學生職場英語文溝通能力，如提案、企劃案提寫、時事討論、公司產品行銷、書信寫作，希冀能夠藉由本課程之修習，加強學生進入職場前的競爭力。
description.en: This course is designed to provide students with a firm foundation in business communication skills. Students will learn how to present a proposal, start a discussion, and promote company products in English. It is hoped that by the end of this course, students are equipped with sufficient knowledge of general and business English.

description.zh: 本課程的目的在於培養學生書寫各式專業書信書寫 (如簡歷、提案、會議紀錄等) 的能力，並提供各種共同合作的機會，訓練學生在未來工作上所需之團隊配合能力。搭配本課程充分的練習，學生將能夠準確且有效地運用所學之專業書信形式來達成職場上的溝通需求。
description.en: This course aims to develop students' skills in performing selected types of professional written discourse (e.g., resumes, proposals, meeting minutes). Various opportunities for students to collaborate with their classmates will also be provided as they will often be required to do so in an actual workplace. With sufficient practice, students will finish this class with the ability to communicate clearly and effectively in written forms.

description.zh: 本課程提供學生及職前專業人士必備之英語文語言技巧，強調管理專業領域之英文溝通能力之訓練。課程內容依學院專業內容區分並整合英語文之聽說讀寫之能力為未來全球化移動及以英語專業溝通人才培育為目標。
description.en: This course aims to provide pre-service management students/professionals with the adequate skills of the English language and communicative competence to facilitate their current academic and future career pursuits. Students are encouraged to utilize their domain expertise to participate in professional communication in English. Centered on the training of professional use of the English language, the ESP curriculum as the crux of a highly-integrated work of domain knowledge and the English learning development embodies the indispensable credentials required for a global profession.

name.en: Course in English language Proficiency Tests

description.zh: 本課主旨在設計課程，提供練習，俾使學生嫻熟各式的英語測驗，如全民英檢、托福測驗、TOEIC 測驗或類似性質的測驗，希冀能夠藉由本課程的修習，提升學生不斷的學習外國語的興致，並且，藉由通過考試取得證照，增加未來職場的競爭力。
description.en: This course is designed to familiarize the students with various kinds of language proficiency tests such as GEPT, TOEFL, TOEIC and many others to the same end. It is our hope that the students who finish taking the course will go on with their enthusiasm on studying foreign languages; besides, through the acquisition of the certificate when the students pass the tests, they are sure to enhance their capability in the increasingly competitive job markets.

name.en: Course in English language Proficiency Tests

notes: 外師授課；以多益750分為目標

description.zh: 本課程旨在透過流行文化的閱讀與討論，厚植英語文實力，並深入了解英美當代社會文化現象。課程選材涵蓋通俗文學、電影、音樂、體育、電視、網路等各種流行文化議題，著重修辭分析，文本摘要，以及批判式閱讀技巧的訓練，期能以多元互動的方式深化英語文能力。
description.en: This course aims to enhance students' competence in English through reading popularculture. The reading will cover a wide variety of "texts" in popular literature, film, music, sports, television and on the Net.  Special emphasis will be put on rhetoric analysis, text summarization, and critical comprehension skills such as identifying themain ideas and supporting details, recognizing context clues, drawing inferences and making critical judgments

name.en: English Presentation for Academic Purposes & Discussion

description.zh: 本課程旨在講授學術簡報要點、介紹常用句型和字彙，主要加強學生英語口語表達流暢及準確度。透過認識簡報流程與架構提昇學術及工作所需之英文簡報能力。
description.en: A course for students giving oral academic presentations in colleges and universities. Learner outcomes include general academic vocabulary development, listening skill improvement in an academic setting, development of effective note-taking skills, and improved academic discussion and presentation skills. Activities include formal presentations, discussions, and reports.

name.en: Course in English language Proficiency Tests

description.zh: 本課主旨在設計課程，提供練習，俾使學生嫻熟各式的英語測驗，如全民英檢、托福測驗、TOEIC 測驗或類似性質的測驗，希冀能夠藉由本課程的修習，提升學生不斷的學習外國語的興致，並且，藉由通過考試取得證照，增加未來職場的競爭力。

It is our hope that the students who finish taking the course will go on with their enthusiasm on studying foreign languages; besides, through the acquisition of the certificate when the students pass the tests, they are sure to enhance their capability in the increasingly competitive job markets.

notes: 外師授課；以多益550分為目標

name.zh: X光在材料分析上的應用

description.zh: X光已經成為材料結構鑑定上一項很有用的技術。這門課將介紹如何應用X光粉末繞射與吸收光譜於材料結構鑑定，以及數據分析。
description.en: X-ray has become a powerful technique on the characterization of material structures. The course will teach how to apply the x-ray diffraction and absorption on structural characterization and even analysis.

description.zh:
本課內容包括高分子鏈之統計力學、高分子之界面作用力及Flory-Huggin理論。
  對於紡織技術學程的規劃，本課程會注重紡織纖維的合成技術，例如用奈米技術加在Nylon纖維上，例如以clay加強Nylon的強度及磨耗性質，用理論的探討例如用Halpin-Tsai equation去預測紡織纖維的楊氏係數，另外也會加強高分子物理化學在紡織纖維成型過程中所扮演的角色。
description.en:
The course includes; statistics of polymer chain, interfacial polymer force, Florry-Huggun theory.
A major objective of this course is to provide a background in polymerizations, polymer structures and polymer properties. The material in this course also covers polymer characterization, polymer rheology and polymer processing. In addition, structures, properties, usages and products of rubbers, plastics and fibers are emphasized and compared. The object of this course is also to provide a background in fiber compositions, synthesis, spinning and characterization. A second goal is to introduce factors that influence fiber compositions, formation and properties.

description.zh: 以纖維材料與複合材料的知識為基礎，實際應用於纖維系複合材料實習；並利用各種現有之機械與電氣性質檢測儀器，對其性能加以評估。其實習內容包括熱可塑與熱固性樹脂之製備；單軸向、雙軸向與三軸向複合材料之加工等之實習;及複合材料機械與電氣性質等之實習。
description.en: On the basis of knowledge from the fiber and composites, various experiments are carried out.  Different measuring instruments are also used to measure and evaluate their mechanical and electrical properties.  The practice includes thermoplastic and thermosetting resin preparation, fiber prepreg preparation, 1-D, 2-D, and 3-D composites processing methods are included. Such as filament winding, hand lay-up, molding compounds, autoclave and vacuum bag method, injection molding, compression molding, SMC, and BMC, pultrusion etc. Otherwise, the mechanical and electrical properties of the composites are also studied.

description.zh: 蛋白質體學工程學，是結合蛋白質生化技術及電腦資訊科技的新領域。由於蛋白質生化技術的快速發展，蛋白質序列的資料也在近幾年中以驚人的速度產生；而這大量的資料經由電腦資訊的整理分析，所延伸出來的知識，已被廣泛地運用在生物醫學上的研究。蛋白質體工程學，是現代生物科技必要的知識。
description.en: Proteomic engineering is a newly developed field joining the knowledge from protein biochemistry and computational technology. Biochemistry techniques in high speed screening such 2D gel and mass-spectrometry have generated large amount of data.  From these data, new frontier in biomedical researches can be explored. Proteomic engineering is one of the essential discipline of biotechnology。

description.zh: 數位製造為一利用數位輔助設計軟體與製造工具將設計想法實現的過程。本課程將這個過程所需要的數位技術模組化，並以系統性的方式逐一介紹各技術模組的理論與操作，藉以培養以三維方式進行設計思考，並能以數位設計與製造流程來實現設計的能力。
description.en: Digital fabrication is a process to realize a design idea through the use of 3D modeling and manufacturing tools. The modularized technologies related to the digital fabrication will be introduced systematically in this course. The aim of this course is to extend the computer-aided design workflow from design thinking to digital fabrication.

description.zh:
1. 架構影片後期製作流程
2. 電腦動畫及視覺特效於影片後製作階段的應用
3. 學習合成與剪接的概念與技巧
4. 暸解最新動畫影視特效趨勢及發展
5. 培養後期製作專案提案與執行能力
description.en:
1. To construct a post-production project
2. To apply animation and visual effects to post-production works
3. To develop concepts and skills in compositing and editing
4. To understand the trends and development in animation effects
5. To develop the ability to propose and execute a post-production project

description.zh: 本課程重點為（一）為簡淺明確的商用英文、（二）與時並進的國際經濟貿易實務，內容涵蓋法律、外匯與銀行、倉儲運輸，國際金融、國際行銷學、廣告學、包裝學、海上保險及度量衡。
description.en: This course acquaints students with present-day commercial English and trade practice, the content of which includes Laws, Foreign Exchange and Banking, Warehousing and Transportation, International Financing, International Marketing, Advertising, Packaging, Marine Insurance and Weights and Measures.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹細胞培養與基因工程之方法與應用。課程內容涵蓋微生物、植物、昆蟲及動物細胞之介紹，細胞生長與代謝，細胞培養方法，生物反應器，基因工程技術與應用實例。
description.en: The purpose of the course is to introduce the technology of cell culture and genetic engineering. The topics include: (1) introduction of microbial, plant, insect, and mammalian cells (2) cell metabolism and growth (3) cultivation of cells in bioreactors (4) fundamentals of genetic engineering (5) application examples.

description.zh: 介紹與醫學相關之醣類生物學
description.en: The course is designed to teach graduate students about the recent advances in glycobiology with medical and biotechnological applications. The prerequisite for the course is general biochemistry. Students are expected to learn the structure, biosynthesis, chemistry and cell biology in related to bioactive glycans.

notes: 四分四和高分所碩士班合開【停開】

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。機器人簡介、齊次轉換矩陣、運動方程式及反運動方程式、軌跡規劃、機器人動力學、機器人控制系統、機器人程式語言、機器人於工業界之應用技術。
description.en: Introduction to Robotic Manipulators, Homogeneous Transformations, Kinematic Equations and Solutions, Trajectory Planning, Dynamics and Control of Robots, Programming and Applications.

notes: 甲乙丙合開 一般教室 綜科327 限24人

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。氣體動力工程概論、壓縮氣體特性、空氣的調理與控制、空氣動力元件和控制迴路、順序控制器氣壓控制之應用、液壓工程基本原理、液壓流體之特性與調理、液壓動力源、致動器、控制元件及迴路、傳送、配管、維護與安全、液氣壓比例與伺服控制、自動控制理論應用於液氣壓工程。
description.en: Introduction to Pneumatic Engineering, Characteristic of Compressible Gas, Air Conditioning & Control, Pneumatic Parts & Control Circuit, Application of Sequence Controller on Pneumatic Control, Introduction to Hydraulic Engineering, Characteristic & Conditioning of Hydraulic Fluid, Hydraulic Theory, Power Unit, Actuator, Control Parts & safety,Hydraulic & Pneumatic Proportional & Servo Control, and Application of Automatic Control to Hydraulic Engineering.

description.zh: 先修課程：機動學(機構學)、計算機(電腦)程式語言概論、機構運動分析(位置、速度及加速度分析的解析法)、連桿組傳遞角與機械利益的分析、凸輪機構運動分析、壓力角與曲率半徑的分析、齒輪組動力傳遞分析、機構的電腦模擬、機構個案分析。
description.en: Introduction, Kinematic analysis of mechanism(Analysis of Displacement, Velocity and Acceleration by Analytical method), Transmission Angle and Mechanical Advantage of Linkage, Kinematic Analysis, Pressure angle and Profile's Curvature of Cam, Power Flow Analysis of Gear Trains, Computer Simulation of Mechanisms, and Case Study of Mechanism.

notes: 甲乙丙合開 限25人(綜科114)

description.zh:
先修課程：負責教授同意。
本課程主要介紹幾何光學與Coherent光學兩部份之基本概念與應用﹐提供機械領域的學生有關光的知識﹐讓機械領域的學生有能力加入機光電技術整合。本課程首先介紹幾何光學﹐幾何光學雖然簡單﹐卻是光學應用最普遍的知識﹐接著進入Coherent光學原理與應用介紹﹐Coherent光學在光量測技術部份佔了非常重要的地位﹐透過本課程的訓練﹐學生將可更順利的進入光學實驗室工作﹐當然﹐本課程也適合其他對光學有興趣的學生來修習。
description.en: The lectures in this course include two main parts, the geometrical and the coherent optics. Due to the future high technology, the optomechatronics, needs the cooperation of knowledge among the optics, the electrics, and the mechanics. This course gives the students of mechanical engineering the chance to participate in this work group. The lecture will first show the students the geometrical optics which is simple but important in the field of optical application. The coherent optics is the main part in this course which occupies the most optical technique of measurement. After the course the students should have the enough knowledge to work in the optical laboratory. Certainly, this course is also useful for all students who are interest in the area of the optics.

description.zh: 工程分析概論，有限元素模型建立，進階模組技巧，實體模型的建立，一維元素分析，二維元素分析，三維元素分析，進階範例。
description.en: Introduction to Engineering Analysis, Finite Element Model Constructing, Advanced Techniques of Module, Solid models Constructing, One-dimensional Analysis, Two-dimensional Analysis, Three-dimensional Analysis, Advanced Examples.

description.zh: 本課程的目標在使學生了解工業安全衛生的重要,熟悉有關知識及緊急措施,從而增加處變之因應能力.內容包括工業安全衛生組織,事故調查分析,工廠設備安全要領,工業衛生和衛生設備.
description.en: This course is design to introduce the student to concept of the importance of industrial safety and health with emphasis on the ability of dealing with accidents. Topics covered are organization of industrial safety , analysis of Accident ,industrial health and facilities.

description.zh: 先修課程: 負責教授同意。本課程目的在介紹蓬勃發展中的微機電系統(micro-electro-mechanical systems, MEMS)工程與最新應用。其內容包括 : MEMS之概念與特性、微觀設計原則、跨領域模擬分析、加工材料分類、主要製程技術介紹、CMOS-MEMS整合製造、封裝與測試技術、微感測器與微致動器、智慧型元件與SOC、工程應用實例介紹
description.en: The course contents include concept and characteristics of MEMS, principles of micro system design, inter-disciplinary simulation and analysis, materials for MEMS, main-stream MEMS processing technologies, CMOS-MEMS process integration, package and test techniques, micro sensors and actuators, smart devices and SOC, and closure with a number of engineering applications.

description.zh: 先修課程:3001051或負責教授同意。參數化設計之介紹及應用、特徵基底模型之建立及組合、模型特徵之拷貝及仿造、目標導向設計之概念及應用、複雜曲面特徵之合成及修整、模型特徵從屬關係之介紹、圖層之產生及使用、模型組件之合成及修改。
description.en: Introduction and Applications of Parametric Design, Construction and Assembly of Feature Based Models, Copying and Patterning of Model Features, Concept and Applications of Design Intent, Synthesis and Triming of Complex Surface Features, Introduction to Parent-child Relationship Between Model Feature, Generation and Usage of Layers, Synthesis and Modification of Model Assembly.

name.zh: 塑膠射出模具CAE模流分析
name.en: Mold-flow analysis of plastic injection mold CAE

description.zh:
(1) 瞭解CAE網格概念與建構，將以國內開發的模流分析軟體Moldex-3D作為教學實
       習的內容：(2)流動分析，即熔膠充填狀態；(3)保壓分析，分析模內壓力分佈狀態；(4)
       冷卻分析，關於模內溫度分佈；(5)翹曲分析，分析成形品的變形。
description.en: (1) To realize mesh concept and construct the mesh. (2) Flow analysis of melt plastic filling. (3) Packing analysis of pressure distribution in the mold. (4) Cooling analysis of temperature distribution in the mold. (5) Warp analysis of injection molding parts.

notes: 與最後一哩合開，限機械系大三大四，30人(綜科328-1)

description.zh: 先修課程: 負責教授同意。1.數位影像基礎，2.空間域影像強化，3.頻域影像強化，4.影像還原，5彩色影像處理，6形態學影像處理，7.影像分割，8. 影像壓縮，9.機器視覺系統。
description.en: 1. Fundamental digital image, 2. Image enhancement in the spatial domain, 3. Image enhancement in the frequency domain, 4. Image restoration, 5. Color image processing, 6. Morphological image processing, 7. Image segmentation, 8. Image compression. 9. Machine vision system.

name.en: Entrepreneurship Practices: The Apprentice in NTUT

description.zh: 本課程的主要目的在教授學生創新創業的實務，讓學生實際組成團隊進行創業，並有老師全程指導實踐創業，學校並提供基本創業基金與創業場地，輔導學生實際體會創業的過程。課程內容包括：創新創業精神、創新思考、自我了解、團隊組成、經營模式建立、創業財務、創業專題進行、創業競賽等。
description.en: This course is to instruct students to practice the entrepreneurship and innovation. Students will form an entrepreneurship team. Teacher will guide the students throughout the entrepreneurship processes. University will offer students initial funds and incubation assistances. Students will gain practical experiences on how to establish entrepreneurship. The contents include entrepreneurial thoughts and actions, design thinking, self-understanding, team formation, business model development, entrepreneurship finance, entrepreneurship practices, entrepreneurship contests, and so on.

notes: 四資財三與碩士班、最後一哩合開(創新創業種子教師)

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。導論（含系統概論、資料表示法）、微電腦結構－中央處理單元、組合語言－指令型定址法、模組化程式、位元組和字串處裡、I/O 程式、DOS 功能常式、多元程式規劃、系統匯流排結構、I/O 介面、半導體記憶、多元處裡器組態。
description.en: Introduction (Overview of Microprocessor System, Data Representation), Microprocessor Architecture-CPU etc., Assembler Language-Instruction Format, Addressing Modes, Modular Programming, Byte and String Manipulation, I/O Programming, DOS Function Multiprogramming, SystemBus Structure, I/O Interface, Semiconductor Memory, Multiprocessor Configurations.

description.zh: 簡單直流電源製作，I/O (8255介面電路試作與測試)，各種Sensor結構與使用方法介紹，語言程式介紹，Sensor與I/O介面，步進馬達與伺服馬達控制，AD與DA轉換器，光學尺、編碼器組裝與控制，控制加工機台、精度調整。
description.en:
1. DC power supply (±5V, ±12V 或 ±15V 試作)
2. I/O interface (8255 interface controller)
3. Sensors 
4. Structure of the programming 
5. Sensor and I/O interface
6. Stepping and servo motor controller 
7. AD and DA converters
8. Assembly and control of optical scale and encoder 
9. Setup and control of the machine

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。感測器與驅動器簡介，資料傳輸方法，物理式感測器與驅動器：聲動式，磁式性，壓電式，電力式，電磁式，熱電式，熱阻式，光導式，光發射式，光電式。化學式感測器與驅動器：化學與氣體感測器,生醫感測器與生物晶片
description.en: Introduction to sensors and actuators, data transmission methods, physics based sensors and actuators：sonic, magnetic, piezoelectric, electrical, electromagnetic, thermoelectric, thermoresistive, photoconductive, photoemissive, photovoltaic; chemistry based sensors and actuators：chemical and gas sensors, bio-medical sensors and biochips.

description.zh:
「系統整合指標」是智慧建築標章的基礎設施指標群，是做為評定在建築物內各項自動化服務系統在系統整合上之作為、成效與效益。
本課程將培養具備建築應用子系統運作原理與設計要點及工程執行作業與管理的基礎能力。
授課之內容如下：智慧建築系統整合指標以及各應用子系統，如中央監控系統、門禁與保全系統、對講與停車場系統、資通訊系統、綜合佈線與弱電系統、照明系統與CCTV監視系統、智慧家庭與物業管理系統之規劃設計及工程執行管理。
description.en:
"System integration index" is the intelligent building marker infrastructure target group, is assessed as a service in the building automation system, the integration of the system as the effectiveness and benefit.
This course will train with the principle of operation and construction applications subsystem design features and engineering job execution and management of basic capabilities.
Teaching content as follows: Intelligent building integrated system of indicators as well as the application subsystems, such as the central monitoring system, access control and security systems, intercom and parking systems, ICT systems, premises distribution system and electronic systems, lighting systems and CCTV surveillance systems, intelligence design and planning of family and property management systems and project execution management.

notes: 電機系三四年級、電子系三四年級與最後一哩合開

description.zh: 「系統整合指標」是智慧建築標章的基礎設施指標群，是做為評定在建築物內各項自動化服務系統在系統整合上之作為、成效與效益。 本課程將培養具備建築應用子系統運作原理與設計要點及工程執行作業與管理的基礎能力。 授課之內容如下：智慧建築系統整合指標以及各應用子系統，如中央監控系統、門禁與保全系統、對講與停車場系統、資通訊系統、綜合佈線與弱電系統、照明系統與CCTV監視系統、智慧家庭與物業管理系統之規劃設計及工程執行管理。
description.en: "System integration index" is the intelligent building marker infrastructure target group, is assessed as a service in the building automation system, the integration of the system as the effectiveness and benefit. This course will train with the principle of operation and construction applications subsystem design features and engineering job execution and management of basic capabilities. Teaching content as follows: Intelligent building integrated system of indicators as well as the application subsystems, such as the central monitoring system, access control and security systems, intercom and parking systems, ICT systems, premises distribution system and electronic systems, lighting systems and CCTV surveillance systems, intelligence design and planning of family and property management systems and project execution management.

notes: 電子系三四年級、電機系三四年級與最後一哩合開

description.zh: 本課程以理論及個案為出發點，分析知識管理的基本概念知識管理在實務上的應用，知識管理在策略上的重要性，以及企業如何進行知識管理。課程主題包括，組織學習，組織創新，市場導向理論，知識管理概論，知識創造與轉移，知識管理個案，知識管理與資訊技術。
description.en: This course will use case study to analysis how knowledge management impacts on the competitive advantage and its method of implementation. It will include the followings: organizational learning, innovation, market-orientation, knowledge creation, knowledge transferring, knowledge diffusion, and information technology impact on knowledge management.

description.zh: 即使科學昌明如此，但我們日常生活中使用的、不斷推陳出新的照相機、攝錄影機、影印機等，在在都說明幾何光學現在仍然是主宰設計的工具。光學主要是藉著對光本質方面的瞭解，發展有關的理論基礎與計算法則，並進而用在日常生活且增益人類福祉的一門科學。幾何光學則是光學理論中，一連串近似運算的結果，著重在成像的效果和應用的一門工具性知識。本系之幾何光學是一學期、三學分、每週三小時的課程，教學內容大致包含以下三部份：一、介紹光的性質、在介面上反射、折射之有關定理、成像的原因及應用。二、分析像差現象及其成因與評估。三、淺介透鏡之設計。
description.en: Light is the principal means by which we gain knowledge of the world. From putting continually the improved camera, video cassette recorder, copying machine, etc., to market can just account for how important a designing tool the Geometric-Optics is.To build a solid basic theory and a rule for calculating through understanding thoroughly the nature of light is the central goal of Optics. Using the basic theory of optics and processes of approximate estimate, the Geometric-Optics put its point on image formation and its applications.Here in our department, the Geometric-Optics is a 3-credit, 3-hour per week, one-semester course. There are three consecutives parts in the one-semester lecture:The 1st part : (a)the nature of light, (b)the related theorems about reflection and refraction, (c) image formation.The 2nd part : the formation and correctness of aberrations.The 3rd part : the designing of lenses.

description.zh: 本課程介紹國際金融市場以及金融系統。本課程涵蓋範圍包含: 股票市場、貨幣市場、債券市場、外匯市場、房貸市場、投資銀行、保險產業、基金市場…等。主要目的在讓學生了解整個金融市場是如何運作。同時以個案討論方式讓學生對整體的金融市場與機構有通盤的了解。
description.en: This course introduces the international financial markets (i.e. money market, bond market, stock market, mortgage market, foreign exchange market, investment banks, commercial banks…etc). The objectives of this course are to develop a fundamental understanding of (i) how financial markets work; (ii) how financial systems affect people and daily life.

description.zh: 探討如何規畫、組織、用人、領導及控制各種資源包括人員、設備、材料、資金，期能及時在容許預算下完成特定專案。
description.en: This course discovers the planning, organization, employment, leading and control of resources including person, facility, materials, and capital in order to complete the project under the pre-specified time and cost.

notes: 四工三乙、四工四乙合開

description.zh: 此課程主要以三個方面介紹線性規劃：數學模型建立、演算法與原理、對偶理論及敏感度分析。
description.en: This course will cover linear programming including the mathematical models, the simplex methods, duality and sensitivity analysis.

notes: 四工四甲乙與工管所合開【停開】

description.zh: 講授電腦輔助造型設計之繪圖技巧，以Alias軟體之3D曲面特性，傳授3D surface軟體之立體造型繪圖技巧，空間概念與產品設計之應用，訓練學生以電腦繪圖達到3D造型繪製與修改的基本能力與技巧。
description.en: This course introduces the computer aided modeling design，teach students how to use Alias software building conceptual product models and creating quality surface with a comprehensive set of digital modeling 、shape、definition。

description.zh:
本課程為設計理論的講授，其內容包含溝通基本觀念、感知心理、記
號理論、情報理論、傳達理論等之理論架構及應用模式。
description.en: The study of design methodology, including the theory structure and application module of the basic communication knowledge, conception psychology, symbolization theory, information theory and communication theory.

name.en: Introduction to Furniture and Interior Design

description.zh: 以創意的實作訓練為主﹐藉由家具與室內設計空間之相關性的主題, 透過實際設計程序的演練以培養設計的能力。
description.en: Through the operation of furniture and interior design, freshmen will practice details of the design process, materials, and manufacturing process.

description.zh: 建立設計德文基礎之赴德體驗課程；包含設計教育、設計展、博物館、文化及語言等內容。
description.en: This course provides German for Design in Germany related topics on culture and Design. The course will be characterized by inter-disciplinary and experiential verification.

name.zh: 資訊創新達人國際證照講座
name.en: Seminar of International Certification on Informational Creativity Experts

description.zh: 為提升學生資訊媒體創新應用能力，培養敬業樂業精神與優良就業態度，增加職場就業競爭力。因此，透過本實務講座，針對資訊軟體ADOBE PHOTOSHOP應用、平面設計人員、影像處理等國際專業證照開設輔導課程。本課程將介紹資訊媒體基本知識與從業人員應具備的專業職能，並輔導同學取得國際專業證照，適合於有志從事資訊媒體與設計相關工作及大學校院相關系所學生。俾培育學生參加並通過專業證照考試以及習得第二應用專長，並提升畢業後之職場競爭力。
description.en: The objectives of this lecture course are to introduce practices of international certification in information and multimedia. This course is designed for students who want to participate in professional certification, and acquire the second application of expertise. The targets of this course are to assist students information basics and media design professional capability, and to develop their employability and competitiveness.

notes: 四資財三與碩士班、最後一哩合開

description.zh: 討論當使用計算機來解決數學問題時的能力及限制,並介紹相關改進或解決的方法. 主題內容包含: (1) 誤差, (2) 數值演算法, (3) 數學計算軟體, (4) 浮點運算, (5) 矩陣運算, (6) 多項式內插法, (7)數值積分, (8)非線性方程式, (9)初值問題.
description.en: This course discusses the constraints when using computers to solve mathematical problems, and introduces some numerical methods to improve or overcome the difficulty. Covered topics include: (1) Errors, (2) Numerical Algorithms, (3) Mathematical Software, (4) Floating-point Computations, (5) Matrix Computations, (6) Polynomial Interpolation, (7) Numerical Integration, (8) Nonlinear Equations, (9) The Initial Value Problem.

description.zh: 本課程針對SGS檢驗公司為台北科技大學學生設計的先進儀器分析講座，針對目前生活中食品安全、衣物安全等，與人切身關係的民生用品及環境安全之議題所衍生之有害物質分析，邀請SGS企業講師進行先進儀器分析演講及實機訓練，並於課程中安排學生到SGS公司實地見習。
description.en: The course is to introduce advanced instrumental analysis technology for Hazardous Substances in our daily life. This course will invite world well-known company, SGS to share their success stories and new technology with the students.

notes: 四分三四與最後一哩合開，有一場參訪活動

name.zh: 國際專業證照研訓實務講座
name.en: Practice Seminar of International Professional Certification

description.zh: 為因應近年全球與國內經濟不景氣，各校將更關切社會、經貿與人力市場動態，力圖革新以求招生與就業之競爭力。思考工程產業與商業服務業的科班培育人數，並加強學生專業條件與附加價值，培養敬業積極職業精神與態度，以助其未來職場生存與永續發展。因此，透過本「國際專業證照研訓實務講座」課程針對國際性專業證照實務的研究與探討，以培育學生參加並通過國際專業證照考試以及習得第二應用專長為目標，俾培育學生專業能力並提升畢業後之就業競爭力。本學期專門培訓學生通過Microsoft 國際證照之Word 與Excel為目標，以協助同學建立跨領域與國際化能力之專長。
description.en: The objectives of this lecture course are to analysis the practices of international professional licenses in management, nurture students to participate in international professional certification exams, and acquire the second application of expertise. The targets of this course are to serve students cultivate international professional capacity and enhance their employability and competitiveness after graduation. This semester will help students to pass the licenses of Word and Excel, and further to obtain the interdisciplinary expertise with international capabilities.

notes: 計網電腦教室，限60人【停開】

name.en: Intelligent Applications of Internet of Things

description.zh: 本課程的主要目的在教授學生機器學習、大數據等人工智慧技術，並使用在物聯網的創新與應用上。課程內容包括：人工智慧概論、大數據方法、機器學習方法、資料探勘方法、最佳化方法、物聯網概論、影音處理、雲端技術、物聯網系統實作等。
description.en: This course is to instruct students the basics of artificial intelligent methods and apply these methods to innovative applications of Internet of Things. The contents include introduction to artificial intelligence, machine learning methods, data mining methods, optimization methods, introduction to internet of things, video and audio processing, cloud computing, and innovation project implementation.

notes: 資財,電子,電機,資工系所與最後一哩合開

name.zh: 國際觀培養-馬來文化與語言
name.en: Emerging Market Series: Getting to know Malaysia

description.zh: 在全球金融海嘯後，已開發國家經濟成長趨緩，新興亞洲國家特別是東協五國經濟成長迅速，藉由傳授東南亞四小語以協助學生拓展東南亞的就業版圖並促進台灣與東南亞國家之間的經貿關係。本課程旨在培養學生的基本溝通能力，運用馬來語來與當地馬來母語者打招呼、了解馬來文化、建立人際關係、購物、敘述事物…等，以此來協助學生前往馬來西亞就業作為兩國的經濟橋樑。
description.en:
In order to embrace economic development of globalization, especially in Asian and Southeast Asian countries, there is a need to introduce and equip our students not only with the basic local language but also to understand the local culture so as to strengthen the economic tie between Taiwan and the Asian countries and to enhance the employment opportunities of our students in these Asian countries.
This course aims to help students to understand and develop basic communication skills by utilizing Bahasa Malaysia (Malaysian language) to communicate with Malaysian in terms of greeting, business contact establishment, interpersonal communication, etc. Historical and geographical backgrounds of Malaysia and their local cultures will also be introduced.

notes: 四土四甲乙與最後一哩合開，限30人

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。主要讓學生具有電腦控制之概念其內容涵蓋:電腦周邊設備簡介，PC-base 控制簡介，介面卡之選用，A/D與 D/A轉換原理與應用，I/O 介面實驗，程式設計與外部機械控制
description.en: Introduction of concept of computer control system, computer architecture, PC-base control unit, motion elements, selection of PC interface card, application of A/D and D/A conversion, program design and machine control

description.zh: 以視覺藝術為探討重點，研究藝術起源以及原始美術、民俗與大眾藝術分野。探究式覺元素和設計原理以及應用媒材、使用技巧，涵蓋素描、水彩、油畫、版畫、混合媒材、雕塑、建築，廣告、包裝、服裝設計、工業產品設計及攝影等。配合幻燈教學，使同學對於視覺藝術有整體性、概括性的認識，以奠定將來從事藝術鑑賞和研究創造之基礎。
description.en: The focus of this course is the exploration of visual arts.  Students will study the origin of art and the distinction among primitive art, folk and popular art. This course also provides students with visual elements, design principles, applied media material, and techniques including charcoal drawing, water-colored painting, oil painting, graphic art, compound material, sculpture, architecture, advertisement, packaging, fashion design, industrial design, and photography. Slide teaching is adopted to give students a comprehensive and general understanding on visual art in order to foster students to appreciate, study, and create art.

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養學生成為具有深度文化視覺的科技人。從認識本土文化為起點，進而認識世界文化。引導學生如何探究文化現象，並且深入文化的精神境界，物質境界，瞭解文化價值與文化傳統，讓文化觀點充分融入個人的思維內涵。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to develop the cultural cultivation of our technology majored students. Starting with the culture of our own land and extending to world-wide culture. The teachers would guide the students to explore the phenomena of the culture, and try to find out both the spirit and the material of the culture. Through the understanding of the worth and the tradition of the culture, the students might merge the cultural cultivation into their personal thinking.

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養學生成為具有深度文化視覺的科技人。從認識本土文化為起點，進而認識世界文化。引導學生如何探究文化現象，並且深入文化的精神境界，物質境界，瞭解文化價值與文化傳統，讓文化觀點充分融入個人的思維內涵。

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養學生成為具有豐富文學素養的科技人。引導學生如何探索文學作品，認識各種不同類型文學作品的發展歷程，以及每個重要發展階段的寫作理念，指標作家與作品。課程中將探討東西方古今詩詞、散文、小說、戲劇等文學類型的特點，透過分析作品，解讀作品，奠立遨遊世界文學堂奧的基礎。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the literary taste of our technology majored students. The teachers would guide the students to explore the master pieces in the literary world, to know the different types of works with their development, and also the main writing theory in each period. Of course, the representative writers and their works would be introduced. During the course, regardless of the characters of western, east or ancient, modern literature, including poem, essay, novel and drama, would all be discussed. Through the internalization and reading the articles, the students might lay a foundation in the grand universal literary world.

Through the internalization and reading the articles, the students might lay a foundation in the grand universal literary world.

description.zh:
法學概論，顧名思義是在介紹法律原理，以啟發學生法學研究的興趣。然而，法學涵蓋的層面甚廣，法學緒論的課程，只能大略介紹各種法律的共通原理，就繁駁的法律現象，作綜合的引說，俾使初學法律的人，不僅能粗知「實定法」的共通原則，還可藉此原則來培養法律見解和修養，執簡馭繁，因而體會法律的性質、內涵和理念。
有關本課程的教授方式，擬先介紹法律的基概念及原理，並以答問之方式訓練學生邏輯反思的能力，同時輔以日常屢見之法律實例問題。如此，學生不僅可以可以學習正確的法律觀念和知識，並可培養縝密思辨的能力，將課堂上所習得的知識應用落實在日常生活中，以達保障並維護自己及他人權益之目的。
description.en: Introduction of Law is to introduce the theory of law and to promote students' interest to study law. Since the field of law is very broad but the time is limited, this course can briefly explain common principles of law, complex phenomena of law, etc. The main purpose of this course is to let students catch the concept of common principles of "lex scripta."  Also, this course aims to promote students' knowledge about law, thus cultivating their spirit of abiding by law.  This course will introduce the basic concept and theory of law first. Then students will be given logical training through discussion.  Besides, the general cases and problems of law will be covered as well. Through this course, students can not only get correct concepts of law, but learn to protect their/others' right.

description.zh: 新經濟與舊經濟的分野不是在有『e』還是沒有『e』，而是在有『i』還是沒有『i』，而『i』就是『Innovation，創新』。二十一世紀的『腦力經濟』最重要的戲規則就是『智慧財產權』，同時也是WTO會員國必須遵守的重要規範之一。課程內容主要包括三個最基本的智慧財產權課題：專利權，商標權，以及著作權；而為配合本校學生學科背景，本課程將較著重於『專利』方面的實務知識，並且講授『如何激發創意，以培養學生日後能好好應用『智慧財產權』的保護。
description.en: The difference between New-economy and Old-economy is not caused by having "e" or not having "e", but caused by owining "i" or not owning "i". where "I" means "Innovation:.  Intellectual Property is not only the most importance business rule of the :Brain economy era:, but also one of the most important agreements among WTO members.  This course includes the basic three subjects of Intellectual Property:Patent, Trademark, and Copyright.  In order to accommodate the learning background for most of NTUT students, the contents of this course will focus more on the practical practice of the Patennt.  In addition, it also includes the subject of "how to activate your creativeness:so as to make students can use what they learn, "Intellectual Property:, to protect their intellectual work.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹中華民國憲法、探討憲政體制的運作、人民權利義務的規範及相關法律的適用等問題。期能使學生認知國家民主法治的實施狀況，維護社會秩序與個人基本權利，進而體現人性尊嚴的價值。
description.en: This course focuses the discussions on the Constitution of the Republic of China,constitutional mechanism, the rights and obligations for the people and legitimate operations of the society. It is our hope that the students may have a better understanding on how the democracy is performed in our country as well as on how to preserve social security and basic human rights of the individuals-with the realization of human dignity as our extreme goal.

description.zh: 新經濟與舊經濟的分野不是在有『e』還是沒有『e』，而是在有『i』還是沒有『i』，而『i』就是『Innovation，創新』。二十一世紀的『腦力經濟』最重要的戲規則就是『智慧財產權』，同時也是WTO會員國必須遵守的重要規範之一。課程內容主要包括三個最基本的智慧財產權課題：專利權，商標權，以及著作權；而為配合本校學生學科背景，本課程將較著重於『專利』方面的實務知識，並且講授『如何激發創意，以培養學生日後能好好應用『智慧財產權』的保護。
description.en: The difference between New-economy and Old-economy is not caused by having "e" or not having "e", but caused by owining "i" or not owning "i". where "I" means "Innovation:.  Intellectual Property is not only the most importance business rule of the :Brain economy era:, but also one of the most important agreements among WTO members.  This course includes the basic three subjects of Intellectual Property:Patent, Trademark, and Copyright.  In order to accommodate the learning background for most of NTUT students, the contents of this course will focus more on the practical practice of the Patennt.  In addition, it also includes the subject of "how to activate your creativeness:so as to make students can use what they learn, "Intellectual Property:, to protect their intellectual work.
