name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Nomocracy

description.zh: 本課程以民主、法治課程為核心，重在強化公民的素養，增進政治體制及法律運作實務等之相關課程。
description.en: Democracy and nomocracy are the core curriculum, focusing on enhancing the quality of citizens and promoting the related courses in  the political system, the operation of the law practices and so on.

notes: 教師張國城.北醫大8005教室,博雅選修法治向度

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：History

description.zh: 本課程主要是讓學生對歷史這門學科有一通盤、系統的認識，以便讓學生瞭解歷史的思維取向，增加個人的歷史意識。並在歷史學門的領域中，提供數門基礎及進階課程，供同學選修，以期同學從課程的學習中，理解台灣、中國乃至世界文明的進程與發展，剖析歷史學與現實的互動，提昇學生批判思考之能力。
description.en: This course focuses on getting the students familiar with the academic field of history in a more comprehensive and systematic view. The students are stimulated to think and make judgment with a view to "knowing the history," adding to a better sense of history. Further, they are guided to select some  courses in the field of history, including the formation and changes of the of Taiwan China and the World-as well as interactions between history and the reality-thus enhancing their critical ability to think and judge.

notes: 教師曾美芳.北醫大2204教室,博雅選修歷史向度

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。材料性質、製程與結構之關係、機械基礎-彈性行為、塑性基本理論。冶金基礎-單晶的塑性變形、差排理論、強化機構、材料的破壞。
description.en:
Mechanical Fundamentals: Introduction, stress and strain relationships for Elastic Behavior, 
Elements of the theory of Plasticity, etc.. Metallurgical Fundamentals: Plastic Deformation of Single Crystal, Dislocation Theory, Strengthening Mechanism, Fracture, etc..

name.en: Intelligent Applications of Internet of Things

description.zh: 本課程的主要目的在教授學生機器學習、大數據等人工智慧技術，並使用在物聯網的創新與應用上。課程內容包括：人工智慧概論、大數據方法、機器學習方法、資料探勘方法、最佳化方法、物聯網概論、影音處理、雲端技術、物聯網系統實作等。
description.en: This course is to instruct students the basics of artificial intelligent methods and apply these methods to innovative applications of Internet of Things. The contents include introduction to artificial intelligence, machine learning methods, data mining methods, optimization methods, introduction to internet of things, video and audio processing, cloud computing, and innovation project implementation.

notes: 資財,電子,電機,資工系所與最後一哩合開

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為讓學生參與社會或學校等職場服務體驗，拓展學習領域、培育勤勞品格、落實誠樸精勤精神，同時藉由參與行動中接觸各種實務職場經驗增進學生之實務能力，以使畢業後能順利適應社會職場環境。課程包括：行政程序、安全衛生、人際關係及服務品質效能等主題之學習與體驗。
description.en: This course is to enable students to participate in service experience in the workplace or schools. Students are asked to explore the learning areas, to expanding fields of study, to develop the cultivate character, and to implement the abilities of practical experience in the work place. After this course, students would have the abilities of service skills. This course includes some topics: administrative procedures, health and safety, communication skills, and quality of service.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為訓練有志於教學服務的學生，提供參與教學協助之服務實習環境，學習運用自身系所專業知能與訓練溝通表達解說能力，輔助教師教學進行，體驗學習到熟稔課程基本理論、課程教材教具準備及歸位、課堂協助教學活動或演示操作教具、帶領討論、課後協助進行課業輔導、解說試題、學習如何批改作業報告、協助監督測驗等實際行動，透過教學相長過程，增加協助教學實務經驗。
description.en: This course is designed for students who are interested in teaching. It provides opportunities to the students to put their academic training in a practical teaching environment. They will participate in various aspects of teaching, e.g. assisting the teacher in the classroom. They will be allowed opportunities to foster their communication skills and the ability to express and explain themselves in order to facilitate class discussion. They will be able to familiarize themselves with the principal theory of the course, preparation of course materials, teaching aids, demonstration of the teaching aids and materials and leading the class discussion. They will also participate in the after class assistance, e.g. academic counseling, reviewing and explaining questions with the students. They will also learn how to mark or grade reports, have the practical experience in supervising tests. The overall goal is to increase and enhance student’s teaching ability through the practical teaching

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為讓學生可以利用暑期或其它時間至學校認可之校外公私立機構進行或參與實習，以增進學生之實務能力。學生於學校認可之校外機構實習總累計時數不得低於320小時。學生實習期滿後，應依據各系規定繳交相關實習相關成果報告，彙交所屬系保存，並作為成績核定之依據。學生校外實習學期成績之評定比例原則：實習單位占50%，輔導老師占50%，各系得依其屬性調整之。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to elevate an all-round ability for the students at NTUT. During the summer break　or other periods of time, students are required to go to government-based organizations or industry/business-oriented agencies with respect to promoting practice of ability. The course takers will need to stay in the same individual organization or agency with an accumulated amount of time of no less than 320 hours. After the students complete the requirements in question, these organizations and agencies will offer them certificates -- or proof of any kind -- in accordance with the real performance on site. The grading principle will be equivalently decided by the thesis advisor (50%) and the on-site organization or agency (50%), respectively. The individual department or graduate institute may make proper adjustments according to the situations in need.

description.zh: 介紹產品開發的流程與工作的內容，運用產學合作模式，輔導學生實際參與和體驗產業界之產品開發專案，訓練學生團隊合作與問題解決能力。
description.en: Introduce Product develop process and C-flow , guide and help students ' active ,training their team work capability , independent thinking and problem-solving skills.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技四年級下學期實施選修專項分組教學，課程修畢有一學分並計入畢業學分內。由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: In second semester, Senior students also can choose to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. When they are finishing the course that can get the credit, also can account in graduate credit.  For Senior level, Classes are giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技四年級下學期實施選修專項分組教學，課程修畢有一學分並計入畢業學分內。由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。

Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生利用學期間至相關機構實習（實習實際天數依「校外實習」實行辦法另訂之），參與校外合作機構所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業企業之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告，彙交系上保存。
description.en: The course is developed to increase students' capability of on-job practice. Participation in one of the corporative company during curriculum session, practice and learn the real operation of the ing related fields . A practice intern and a well-prepared report must be completed to the course requirement.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，修課學生必須至化學、化工相關機構實習，參與校外合作工廠所提供之實質訓練，觀摩學習專業工廠之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告，於次一學期註冊後，再由指導教師依據學生之心得報告，加以檢核、指導撰寫成實習成果報告，彙交系上保存，可供其他同學參考。
description.en: The course is developed to increase students' capability of on-job practice. Participation in one of the corporative chemical or chemical engineering company, practice and learn the real operation in the field of molecular science and engineering. A practice intern and a well-prepared report must be completed to the course requirement.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生利用整學期至化學工程與生物科技相關機構實習，參與校外合作機構所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業工廠之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告。須在同一機構連續實習4.5月，學生應全職於實習機構實習。
description.en: The course is developed to increase on-job practice capability of students. Participants practice and learn the real operation of the chemical engineering and biotechnology related fields in one of the corporative chemical engineering company during one semester. A practice intern and a well-prepared report must be completed to the course requirement. It is necessary to practice in one corporative chemical engineering company full-time at least 4.5 months.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為讓學生學期中至學校認可之校外公私立機構進行或參與實習，以增進學生之實務能力。學生於學校認可之校外機構實習至少為期4.5個月。學生實習期滿後，應依據各系規定繳交相關實習相關成果報告，彙交所屬系保存，並作為成績核定之依據。學生校外實習學期成績之評定比例原則：實習單位占50%，輔導老師占50%，各系得依其屬性調整之。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to elevate an all-round ability for the students at NTUT. During the semester, students are required to go to government-based organizations or industry/business-oriented agencies with respect to promoting practice of ability. The course takers will need to stay in the same individual organization or agency with an accumulated amount of time of 4.5 months. After the students complete the requirements in question, these organizations and agencies will offer them certificates -- or proof of any kind -- in accordance with the real performance on site. The grading principle will be equivalently decided by the thesis advisor (50%) and the on-site organization or agency (50%), respectively. The individual department or graduate institute may make proper adjustments according to the situations in need.

name.zh: 部份工時學期校外實習

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生須於學期中至光電工程相關機構連續實習18週，每週不得低於2.5天。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核，學生應於校外實習完成後一週內繳交校外實習報告，由實習輔導老師評定實習成績。
description.en: This course is designed to enhance students' on-job practical experiences. Students will work at an electro-optical engineering related company or research organizations for 18 weeks(20 hours per week) during the semester. Through the program, students would learn the hands-on professional technology. Each student would be required to submit a written report right after the end of the internship for grading.

description.zh: 本課程主要是讓學生在畢業之前即獲得長期(一學年)體驗車輛產業的職場經驗，此經驗包括有職場倫理外，也讓學生意識到學校教育與現實職場間的差異、產業對人才的選擇標準、自我能力基本要求的考驗、和未來可就業的相關企業。進而檢討自我的未來生涯規劃。
description.en: The course is designed to help students' career developments and to enhance their long working experiences prior to their graduation. Students will work at a vehicle engineering related company or research organization on-site. The duration is one full-time academic year. Students would learn the real-life operations of professional technology, acknowledge the differences between the school and working environments, understand the business needs, and develop their professional ethics. Through the program, students would be able to self-evaluate the gaps between their own capabilities and the professional needs, and establish or adjust their career development plans accordingly. A student would require to work full-time on-site the company and submit a full academic year paper to fulfill the program requirements.

description.zh: 本課程主要是讓學生在修完學期校外實習(一)之後，在畢業之前希望能獲得較長期體驗車輛產業的職場經驗，此經驗包括有職場倫理外，也讓學生意識到學校教育與現實職場間的差異、產業對人才的選擇標準、自我能力基本要求的考驗、和未來可就業的相關企業。進而檢討自我的未來生涯規劃。
description.en: The course is designed to help students' career developments and to enhance their working experiences prior to their graduation after semester practical training (1). Students will work at a vehicle engineering related company or research organization on-site. The duration is one full-time semester. Students would learn the real-life operations of professional technology, acknowledge the differences between the school and working environments, understand the business needs, and develop their professional ethics. Through the program, students would be able to self-evaluate the gaps between their own capabilities and the professional needs, and establish or adjust their career development plans accordingly. A student would require to work full-time on-site the company and submit a full semester paper to fulfill the program requirements.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為讓學生於學期間至學校認可之校外公私立機構進行或參與實習，以增進學生之實務能力。學生於學校認可之校外機構實習總累計時數不得低於720小時。學生實習期滿後，應依據各系規定繳交相關實習相關成果報告，彙交所屬系保存，並作為成績核定之依據。學生校外實習學期成績之評定比例原則：實習單位占50%，輔導老師占50%，各系得依其屬性調整之。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to elevate an all-round ability for the students at Taipei Tech. During the semester, students are required to go to government-based organizations or industry/business-oriented agencies. The course takers will need to stay in the same individual organization or agency with an accumulated amount of time of no less than720 hours. After the students complete the requirements in question, these organizations and agencies will offer them certificates -- or proof of any kind -- in accordance with the real performance on site. The grading principle will be equivalently decided by the thesis advisor (50%) and the on-site organization or agency (50%), respectively. The individual department or graduate institute may make proper adjustments according to the situations as needed.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生利用學期間至相關機構實習（實習實際天數依「校外實習」實行辦法另訂之），參與校外合作機構所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業企業之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告，彙交系上保存。
description.en: The course is developed to increase students' capability of on-job practice. Participation in one of the corporative company during curriculum session, practice and learn the real operation of the ing related fields . A practice intern and a well-prepared report must be completed to the course requirement.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生利用全學期至相關機構實習（實習實際天數依「校外實習」實行辦法另訂之），參與校外合作機構所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業企業之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告，彙交系上保存。
description.en: The course is developed to increase students' capability of on-job practice. Participation in one of the corporative company during full curriculum session, practice and learn the real operation of the ing related fields . A practice intern and a well-prepared report must be completed to the course requirement.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生須於學期中至相關機構連續實習18週，每週不得低於2.5天。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核，學生應於校外實習完成後一週內繳交校外實習報告，由實習輔導老師評定實習成績。
description.en: This course is designed to enhance students' on-job practical experiences. Students will work at an engineering related company or research organizations for 18 weeks (20 hours per week) during the semester. Through the program, students would learn the hands-on professional technology. Each student would be required to submit a written report right after the end of the internship for grading.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生利用整學期至電子工程相關機構實習，參與校外合作機構所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業工廠之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告。須在同一機構連續實習4.5月，學生應全職於實習機構實習。
description.en: The course is developed to increase on-job practice capability of students. Participants practice and learn the real operation of the electronic engineering related fields in one of the corporative electronic engineering company during one semester. A practice intern and a well-prepared report must be completed to the course requirement. It is necessary to practice in one corporative electronic engineering company full-time at least 4.5 months.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生利用整學期至機械相關機構實習，參與校外合作機構所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業工廠之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告。須在同一機構連續實習4.5月，學生應全職於實習機構實習。

A practice intern and a well-prepared report must be completed to the course requirement. It is necessary to practice in one corporative mechanical engineering company full-time at least 4.5 months.

A practice intern and a well-prepared report must be completed to the course requirement. It is necessary to practice in one corporative civil engineering company full-time at least 4.5 months

Participation is carried out in one of the corporative electrical engineering company during curriculum session. The students practice and learn the real operation of the electrical engineering related fields. A practice intern and a well-prepared report must be completed to the course requirement.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生利用整學年至材料及資源工程相關機構實習，參與校外合作機構所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業工廠之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生每學期必須撰寫實習心得報告以便評分。
description.en: The course is developed to enhance the on-job practical capability of students. Students are trained for an academic year in corporative company or organizations of materials and Mineral Resources Engineering related fields. A practice intern and a well-prepared report must be completed to meet the course requirement for each semester.

notes: 漢翔，限四材四甲同學修讀

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生利用學期至相關機構實習（實習實際天數依「校外實習」實行辦法另訂之），參與校外合作機構所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業工廠之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告，彙交系上保存。
description.en: The course is developed to increase students' capability of on-job practice. Students participate in one of the corporative engineering companies during curriculum session, practice and experience in the materials and mineral resources engineering related fields . A practice intern and a written report must be completed to meet the course requirement.

notes: 華航，限四材四甲同學修讀

description.zh: 課程重點：(1)藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
description.en: This course is designed (1) to strengthen students' previously required knowledge in English with basic grammatical ideas and sentence patterns reviewed through reading materials appropriate to their levels; (2) to develop reading skill by giving explanation of difficult words, phrases, and syntax, as well as analysis of basic writing skill; (3)to  familiarize students with useful expressions in conversation and build up their confidence in cross-cultural communication; (4)to reinforce the competence and performance of listening, speaking, reading and writing by practice.

name.zh: 進階英文閱讀與聽講練習

description.zh: 教導學生閱讀囊括全球議題的文章，並藉由文章的內容作技巧的訓練，字彙的建構，語言的解析，及思維的啟發。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
description.en: The course provides students with explicit skills-based instruction in learning how to process, and decipher the readings that serve as springboards for reading skills development, vocabulary building, language analysis, and thought-provoking discussions. The readings include a variety of viewpoints on global topics centered around social issues, the environment, psychology, business, and technology.  Extension activities are designed to encourage students to go beyond the reading text, and to put what they acquire from the readings into listening, speaking and writing practices.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為讓學生可以利用暑期或其它時間至學校認可之校外公私立機構進行或參與實習，以增進學生之實務能力。學生於學校認可之校外機構實習總累計時數不得低於320小時。學生實習期滿後，應依據各系規定繳交相關實習相關成果報告，彙交所屬系保存，並作為成績核定之依據。學生校外實習學期成績之評定比例原則：實習單位占50%，輔導老師占50%，各系得依其屬性調整之。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to elevate an all-round ability for the students at NTUT. During the summer break　or other periods of time, students are required to go to government-based organizations or industry/business-oriented agencies with respect to promoting practice of ability. The course takers will need to stay in the same individual organization or agency with an accumulated amount of time of no less than 320 hours. After the students complete the requirements in question, these organizations and agencies will offer them certificates -- or proof of any kind -- in accordance with the real performance on site. The grading principle will be equivalently decided by the thesis advisor (50%) and the on-site organization or agency (50%), respectively. description.zh:
本課程以提升學生英文能力，至全民英檢中級以上的程度為目標。教學內容以加強學生日常生活中，如：購物、旅遊、定餐等用語之溝通、運用、表達及閱讀寫作等能力為主。
1. 94學年度起之大學部入學新生擬修習「英文實務」課程說明：學生修習「英文實務」課程，必須參加全民英檢中級初試， 其中「聽力 測驗」及「閱讀測驗」兩項成績合計達80分以上，始得修習此課程，修課學生請持「全民英檢中級初試成績單正本及影本至」教務處註冊組登錄。）
2. 為考量同學因個人生涯規劃，若參加「全民英檢」以外的英語檢定考試，例如適用於全球職場英文能力統一標準之TOEIC測驗及教育部所規定採計之其他英檢考試等。其考試成績如對應符合CEF B1級（全民英檢中級）以上者，免修英文實務。
description.en: The goal of this course is to help students enhance their English proficiency superior to the Intermediate Level of General English Proficiency Test. A student who completes this course will be able to perform routine daily communication such as travel, shopping, ordering a meal, etc. and will have better understanding in reading and writing.

description.zh: 本課主要是介紹數位媒體傳播和發佈的過程。講解知識產權的保護方式和各種許可證的管理。學生使用一些工具來了解數位媒體與權限的一些相關問題。
description.en:
This course aims to provide an introduction to digital media dissemination and distribution process. Also provided will be an understanding of how the intellectual property rights are protected and various licenses managed. Students will also be able to use some of the tools for such purposed and be aware of some of the current related issues. Here are the topics covered in this course:
1.Digital Media Storage and Distribution
2.Intellectual Property protection laws and regulations
3.Content Protection Techniques
4.Digital Right Management
5.DRM Tools and Standards
6.Current Issues and Development

notes: 系所合開(國際學者洪澤權授課,上課時間5/21,5/22全天)
